T01bsu016_u:6701: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyupapadyante sma /
T01bsu016_u:6702: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra daśānāṃ buddhasahasrāṇāṃ prāthamakalpiko dharmacakranirghoṣagaganapradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān,
T01bsu016_u:6704: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra tathāgato madhye (Gv 273) cāturdvīpakasya rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā
T01bsu016_u:6706: tasyāḥ khalu punā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa suprabhaṃ nāma vanaṣaṇḍamabhūt /
T01bsu016_u:6707: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe vanaṣaṇḍe ratnakusumamegho nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
T01bsu016_u:6708: tasmin khalu ratnakusumameghe bodhimaṇḍe vairocanamaṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt, yatra sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīrājastathāgato niṣadya
T01bsu016_u:6710: tena ca samayena manuṣyāṇāṃ daśa varṣasahasrāṇi āyuḥ pramāṇamabhūt /
T01bsu016_u:6711: atha prāṇātipātiṣu sarveṣu loke prādurbhūteṣu adattādāyiṣu kāmamithyācāriṣu mṛṣāvādiṣu paiśunikeṣu pāruṣikeṣu saṃbhinnapralāpiṣu abhidhyāluṣu vyāpannacitteṣu mithyādṛṣṭiṣu,
T01bsu016_u:6712: evaṃ daśasvakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vipulībhūteṣu supratiṣṭhiteṣu sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgataḥ paripūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ bodhimaṇḍagato bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa lokendrāṇāṃ ca pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ kuśalamūlaparipācanāya //
T01bsu016_u:6713: tena ca samayena tasyāṃ rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
T01bsu016_u:6714: tena adattādāyināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ caurāṇāṃ kilbiṣakāriṇāṃ prāṇātipātināṃ kāmamithyācāriṇāṃ mṛṣāvādināṃ paiśunikānāṃ pāruṣikāṇāṃ saṃbhinnapralāpināṃ abhidhyālūnāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ
T01bsu016_u:6715: mithyādṛṣṭikānāmadharmarāgaraktānāṃ viṣamalobhābhibhūtānāṃ mithyādharmaparigatānāṃ kṛtapāpānāṃ kṛtaraudrāṇāmakṛtapuṇyānāmakṛtabhayabhīrutrāṇānāmamātṛjñānāmapitṛjñānāmaśrāmaṇyānāmabrāhmaṇyānāmamanāryajñānāmaparādhināmanekāni śatasahasrāṇi cārake prakṣiptānyabhūvan damanārthāya /
T01bsu016_u:6716: rājñaḥ khalu punaḥ jayaprabhasya vijitāvī nāma putro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgato 'ṣṭaviṃśatibhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairupetaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6717: atha sa sarasvatisaṃgītiprāsādābhirūḍho mahāstrīgaṇaparivāraparivṛtaḥ teṣāṃ cārakāvaruddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhagāḍhabandhanabaddhānāṃ bhairavamutkrośaśabdamaśrauṣīt /
T01bsu016_u:6718: śrutvā ca punarudvignaḥ saṃvignacitto mahākaruṇāsaṃjātaḥ tasmātprāsādādavatīrya taccārake praviśya adrākṣīttāṃścārakagahanaprakṣiptān sattvān nānāhaḍinigaḍakaṭakakuṇḍalaśṛṅkhalākhalīnabandhanabaddhān parasparaśarīravinibaddhān mahāndhakāraprakṣiptān dhūmatimirāvṛtān viṣamavātopahataśarīrān dhamanīsaṃtatagātrān kṣutpipāsāparipīḍitān nagnān nirvasanān pāṃśurajaḥsaṃmrakṣitaśarīrāṃśca keśābhicchāditakāyān
T01bsu016_u:6719: urunigaḍabandhanabaddhān vividhāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇān duḥkhavedanāmanubhavamānānanekavidhān kāraṇān paridevavipralāpān pramuñcamānān /
T01bsu016_u:6720: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahatkāruṇyamutpādya udārakaruṇāśayasaṃjātaḥ parahitādhāno 'dbhutacetāścārakagahanagatān sattvān samāśvāsayāmāsa bandhanavipramokṣāya /
T01bsu016_u:6721: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhayaṃ datvā yena rājā jayaprabhastenopasaṃkramya evamāhayatkhalu devo jānīyāt - mayā bandhanāgārabandhanagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāruṇyādabhayaṃ dattam /
T01bsu016_u:6723: atha jayaprabheṇa rājñā sarvāṇi pañcāmātyaśatāni saṃnipātya paripṛṣṭāniyuṣmākaṃ kathaṃ bhavati? ta āhuḥ - ete rājakośavilopino rājño
T01bsu016_u:6727: vadha evaiṣāṃ daṇḍo bandhanagatānāṃ vā maraṇam /
T01bsu016_u:6731: atha khalu sa vijitāvī rājaputro mahākaruṇāparipīḍitastānamātyān provācatathāstu yathā yūyaṃ vadatha /
T01bsu016_u:6737: yadyahametān sattvānasmādbandhanānna śaknomi mocayitum, tatkathaṃ śakyaṃ traidhātukabandhanāgāragatān sattvāṃstṛṣṇāpāśavinibaddhān avidyāgahanagatān mohāndhakāraprakṣiptān dāridryaduḥkhaprapīḍitān
T01bsu016_u:6738: gambhīragahanadurgatipratipannān visaṃsthitavivarṇaśarīrān nirastasarvendriyaprayogān vibhrāntamānasān aniḥsaraṇadarśinaḥ ālokavirahitāṃstāṃstraidhātukābhiniviṣṭān puṇyajñānasaṃbhāravikalān jñānāyatanaparibhraṣṭān nānākleśamalinacittān duḥkhapañjaraprakṣiptān
T01bsu016_u:6740: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastān sarvān bandhanagatān sattvāṃstasmādbandhanāgārātparimocayati sma ātmaparityāgena sarvaparivāreṇa sarvadhanaskandhena /
T01bsu016_u:6741: sa tān parimocya yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhopadhānaṃ tadutsṛjya na vinivartayate sma /
T01bsu016_u:6742: atha tāni pañcāmātyaśatānyūrdhvabāhūni utkrośamānāni jayaprabhaṃ rājānamupasaṃkramya evamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - vijitāvinaḥ kumārasya cchandenāyaṃ
T01bsu016_u:6745: yadi devo vijitāvino rājakumārasya nigrahaṇaṃ ca kariṣyati, devasya nacireṇa jīvitaṃ
T01bsu016_u:6747: atha khalu jayaprabho rājā kupito vijitāvinaṃ rājakumāraṃ saha tairaparādhibhiḥ puruṣairvadhāyotsṛṣṭavān
T01bsu016_u:6748: tasya mātā janetrī tacchrutvā udvignā strīsahasraparivṛtā pramuktakeśī nirābharaṇagātrī svamukhaṃ vyālupya urastāḍayantī pāṃśvavakīrṇaśiraskā krandamānā ārtasvaraṃ rudantī rājānamupasaṃkramya saparivārā caraṇayornipatya evaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa -
T01bsu016_u:6751: atha rājā vijitāvinaṃ kumāraṃ saṃmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā evamāhaṃ - utsṛja kumāra etānaparādhino manuṣyān /
T01bsu016_u:6753: sa vadhamabhyupagatavānasaṃlīnena cittena asaṃkucitena sarvajñatārambaṇaprayuktena parahitapariṇatena mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamena /
T01bsu016_u:6755: darśanāya-ardhamāsaṃ kumāro dānaṃ dadātu yasya yenārthaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6758: atha tasyā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā uttareṇa pūrvayajñavāṭaprakṛtaṃ sūryaprabhaṃ nāma mahodyānam
T01bsu016_u:6759: tatra kumāro 'bhiniṣkramya yasya yenārthaḥ tasya tatprādāt /
T01bsu016_u:6760: tena nirargalaṃ yajñaṃ yajatā ardhamāsaṃ vividhā dānavidhayo dattāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6764: sa ca bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgataḥ sattvaparipākavinayakālamāgamayya taṃ yajñavāṭamupasaṃkrānto devendragaṇaparivṛto nāgendragaṇaparivṛto nāgendrasaṃpūjito yakṣendrakāyābhinato gandharvendrābhiṣṭuto
T01bsu016_u:6766: garuḍendrapūjāvidhibhirabhiprakīrṇaḥ prītimanobhiḥ kinnarendaiḥ paripūjitaḥ stutisaṃgītisaṃcodito mahoragendrasaṃprekṣitāvalokitavadanaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6767: adrākṣīt sa mahājanakāyo vijitāvī ca rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ guptaṃ jitendriyaṃ nāgamiva sudāntaṃ hradamivācchaṃ viprasannamanāvilaṃ mahatā buddhavikurvitaprātihāryeṇa mahatyā buddhavṛṣabhitayā virocayamānaṃ buddhādhipateyenābhibhavantaṃ buddhamāhātmyatayā prabhāsayamānaṃ mahābuddhalakṣaṇānuvyañjanavibhūṣaṇopaśobhitakāyaṃ sarvalokaṃ buddhaprabhāmaṇḍalāvabhāsena spharamāṇaṃ buddharaśmibhiravabhāsayamānaṃ sarvaromavivarebhyo gandharatnārciścakrāṇi pramuñcamānaṃ buddhakṣetraprakampanena sarvalokaṃ saṃkampayamānaṃ sarvavyūhameghapravarṣaṇena buddhavikrameṇa sarvasattvakleśaprajahanena buddheryāpathena sarvasattvaprītivegavivardhanena buddhadarśanaprabhāvenopasaṃkramamāṇam /
T01bsu016_u:6770: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumāraḥ sa ca mahān janakāyastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ tathāgataṃ dūrādeva pratyudgamya prasannacittaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya pādau śirasābhivandya anekavidhayā pūjayā saṃpūjya evaṃ vācamabhāṣata - ehi bhagavan, ehi sugata /
T01bsu016_u:6771: samanvāhṛtāḥ smaḥ tathāgatena, anuparigṛhītāḥ smaḥ sugatena /
T01bsu016_u:6772: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastasya bhagavato 'grāsanamupadarśayan evamāha -
T01bsu016_u:6779: tasya sahadarśanena tasyāṃ parṣadi sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ praśāntāḥ,
T01bsu016_u:6781: atha khalu bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgatastān sattvān bhājanabhūtān viditvā anupūrveṇa kathāmakārṣīt /
T01bsu016_u:6784: atha tāvadeva tataḥ parṣado 'śītīnāṃ prāṇiniyutānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam
T01bsu016_u:6786: daśa ca prāṇisahasrāṇi mahāyāne vinītāni, yaduta samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāmahāpraṇidhānaparipūrinaye 'vatāritāni /
T01bsu016_u:6787: evaṃ tasya bhagavato mahābuddhavikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānasya daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ sattvā mahāyāne vinayamagaman /
T01bsu016_u:6791: vijitāvī ca rājakumāra imaṃ sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratyalabhata //
T01bsu016_u:6792: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vijitāvī rājakumāro 'bhūt, yena tatsvakāyajīvitaṃ parityajya
T01bsu016_u:6793: sarvadhanaskandhaparivāraṃ parityajya sarvamānuṣyakaṃ ca jīvalokasukhaṃ parityajya te bandhanagatāḥ sattvāḥ tasmādbandhanāt parimokṣitāḥ? sa ca nirargalo mahāyajño yaṣṭaḥ? sa ca bhagavān
T01bsu016_u:6795: ārāgitaḥ? tasya ca tathāgatasya sahadarśanenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam? eṣa ca sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ? na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T01bsu016_u:6796: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena vijitāvī nāma rājakumāro
T01bsu016_u:6798: mayā tadvijitāvīrājakumārabhūtena mahākaruṇāprapīḍitena sarvajagaddhitapratipannena traidhātukāniśritena vipākāpratikāṅkṣiṇā yaśaskīrtināmānabhinandinā ātmānamanutkarṣayatā paramapaṃsayatā sarvavastvanabhiniviṣṭena bhavasaṃjñoccalitena traidhātukānabhinandinā lokaviṣayasukhavimukhena tathāgataviṣayāvimukhena bodhyāśayaviśuddhena adhyāśayavajrapariniṣpannena sarvajaganmahāmaitrīprayogena sarvajaganmahākaruṇāduḥkhavyupaśamasaṃprayuktena tathāgatabalādhyāśayamadhyālambatā bodhisattvamārgaṃ pariśodhayatā mahāyānavyūhaniryāṇapathamalaṃkurvatā sarvajñatāmārgamabhivilokayatā
T01bsu016_u:6801: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyāni tāni tena samayena
T01bsu016_u:6802: pañcāmātyaśatānyabhūvan, yaiḥ sa rājā jayaprabho vitathaṃ vijñāpya mama
T01bsu016_u:6804: imāni tāni pañca puruṣaśatāni yāni devadattena bhagavato vadhāyodyojitāni /
T01bsu016_u:6805: tāni ca bhagavatā vinīya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāni - bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani
T01bsu016_u:6806: sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpaiḥ ekasmin suprabhanāmadheye kalpe pañca buddhaśatāni nānābuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāni nānājanmakulagotrasaṃbhavāni nānāmātāpitṛvyapadeśāni nānājanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanāni nānābhiniṣkramaṇavikurvitāni nānābodhivṛkṣaprabhāsaṃdarśanāni nānābodhimaṇḍopasaṃkramaṇamukhāni nānāmārabhaṅgasaṃdarśanāni nānābhisaṃbodhivikurvitasaṃdarśanāni nānādharmacakrapravartananayanāmaniruktīni nānāsūtrāntanayanirdeśāni
T01bsu016_u:6807: nānāvākpatharutodāhārāṇi nānāparṣanmaṇḍalavyūhāni nānāprabhāmaṇḍalaprabhāvyūhapramuñcanāni nānāyuḥpramāṇāni nānāśāsanādhiṣṭhānāni nānāśāsanavijñaptīni nānānāmadheyāni
T01bsu016_u:6808: mahākaruṇāśarīrāṇi, yeṣāṃ prāthamakalpiko mahākāruṇiko nāma tathāgato ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
T01bsu016_u:6809: tasyāmeva lokadhātau dvitīyaḥ sarvajagaddhitapraṇidhānacandro nāma tathāgata utpatsyate /
T01bsu016_u:6813: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anye te tena kālena tena samayena aparādhinaḥ puruṣā rājakilbiṣakāriṇo 'bhūvan ye te mayā vadhyaghātavaśagatāḥ svakāyajīvitaṃ parityajya tato bandhanāt parimokṣitāḥ? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T01bsu016_u:6815: tadanyāni ca daśaḥ bodhisattvāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi yairbhagavato 'nantabalavighuṣṭanirnāditaśrīsaṃbhavamatestathāgatasya darśanena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam, yānyetarhi daśasu dikṣu
T01bsu016_u:6818: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T01bsu016_u:6819: satyakaḥ sa mahāvādī tena kālena tena samayena jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
T01bsu016_u:6821: - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājaparivāro
T01bsu016_u:6822: 'bhūdantaḥpurastryāgāradauvārikapārṣadyā vā anuyātrikā vā? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T01bsu016_u:6823: imāni tāni ṣaṣṭirnigranthasahasrāṇi, yāni satyakena mahāvādinā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupanītāni, vādidhvajadhāraṇatayā bhagavato vādāyopasaṃkrāntāni /
T01bsu016_u:6824: tāni ca sarvāṇi bhagavatā vyākṛtānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T01bsu016_u:6826: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra vijitāvī rājakumāro mātāpitṛbhyāmanujñātastān bandhanagatān sattvān parimocya sphītāṃ vasumatīṃ dhanakanakaratnasamṛddhāmapahāya putradāraṃ cotsṛjya tasya bhagavato dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājasya tathāgatasyāntike prāvrajat /
T01bsu016_u:6840: sa evaṃ dharmasamanvāgataḥ praticittakṣaṇe daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyākrāmati sma /
T01bsu016_u:6841: ekaikasyāṃ ca lokadhātau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe daśa buddhasahasrāṇi pūrvāntāparāntato 'nusmarati sma /
T01bsu016_u:6842: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ daśa buddhanirmāṇasamudrasahasrāṇi daśadikprasṛtānyavataranti sma /
T01bsu016_u:6844: nānāgatyupapannāṃścyavata (Gv 278) upapadyamānān hīnān praṇītān sugatān durgatān suvarṇān durvarṇān yathākāmopagatān /
T01bsu016_u:6846: cittaparivartān cittacaritāni cintānantaryatāmāśayanānātvamindriyasāgarānapi prayogaprasarānapi karmāvasānamapi paripākavinayakālamapi avatarati sma //
T01bsu016_u:6847: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra vijitāvī rājakumārastataścyutvā tatraiva jambudvīpe rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ tasminneva rājakule upapadya cakravartirājyaiścaryaṃ pratyalabhata /
T01bsu016_u:6848: tena cakravartirājabhūtena tasya bhagavato dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānantaraṃ dharmagaganābhyudgataśrīrājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6849: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe śakrabhūtena devendragarbho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6850: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva lokadhātau suyāmadevarājabhūtena dharaṇīśrīparvatatejo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6851: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau saṃtuṣitadevarājabhūtena dharmacakraprabhanirghoṣarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6852: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau sunirmitadevarājabhūtena gaganakāntarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6854: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātāvasurendrabhūtena sarvadharmanigarjitarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6855: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau brahmendrabhūtena dharmacakranirmāṇasamantapratibhāsanirghoṣo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6856: iti hi kulaputra etāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tasyāmeva ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau tasminneva suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyudapadyanta /
T01bsu016_u:6857: sarve ca te tathāgatā vijitāvinā rājakumāreṇārāgitāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6858: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra suprabhasya mahākalpasyānantaraṃ suraśmirnāma kalpo 'bhūt /
T01bsu016_u:6860: ahaṃ ca tasmin kalpe mahāmatirnāma rājā abhūvam /
T01bsu016_u:6861: tena me rājabhūtena lakṣaṇaśrīparvato nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6862: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe gṛhapatibhūtena saṃvṛtaskandho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6863: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe amātyabhūtena vimalavatso nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6864: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe 'surendrabhūtena veśadhārī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6865: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe vṛkṣadevatābhūtena lakṣaṇasumerurnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6866: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe sārthavāhabhūtena vimalabāhurnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6867: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe nagaradevatābhūten siṃhavikrāntagāmī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ
T01bsu016_u:6868: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe vaiśravaṇabhūtena devendracūḍo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6869: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe gandharvarājabhūtena dharmodgatakīrtināma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ
T01bsu016_u:6870: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe kumbhāṇḍendrabhūtena avabhāsamakuṭī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ
T01bsu016_u:6871: iti hi kulaputra mayaitān daśa tathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tatra suraśmikalpe ṣaṣṭirbuddhakoṭya ārāgitāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6872: nānopapattikāyikayā sarve ca me tathāgatāḥ pūjitāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6873: ekaikaṃ (Gv 279) ca tathāgatamupasaṃkrāmantyā anantamadhyaḥ sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6875: nānādhāraṇīmukhāni nānābhinirhāranayā nānāpratisaṃvinnayābhinirhārā nānāsarvajñatānayānugamā nānādharmālokamukhapratilābhanayā nānājñānanayānugamavicārā nānādiksamudrapraveśāvabhāsā nānākṣetrasamudrāvatārapraveśāvabhāsā nānātathāgatadarśanasamudravijñaptyavabhāsāḥ pratilabdhāḥ, avakrāntā viśuddhāḥ saṃvardhitāḥ prasṛtāḥ pratisṛtāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6876: yathā ca tatra suraśmikalpe tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ, tathā sarvatralokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu ye kecittathāgatā upapadyante, ye 'pi tadanyebhyo lokadhātubhya āgatya tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayamāsuḥ, teṣāṃ mayā sarveṣāṃ
T01bsu016_u:6878: sarve ca mayā te tathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6879: teṣāṃ ca me buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ saṃdhāritam /
T01bsu016_u:6880: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādeṣa sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdho nānāpratilābhanayanānāvimokṣanayamukhaiḥ
T01bsu016_u:6881: atha khalu sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetaṃ vimokṣanayaṃ paridīpayantī saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
T01bsu016_u:6882: acintyametaṃ paramaṃ vimokṣaṃ māṃ pṛcchasi tvaṃ khalu yatprapītaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6885: sarvānatikramya babhūva ramyā ratnaprabhā yā khalu lokadhātuḥ // 13 //
T01bsu016_u:6887: ārāgitāste khalu me munīndrā vimokṣametaṃ paribhāvayantyā // 14 //
T01bsu016_u:6893: vadhāya sṛṣṭāni nṛpeṇa tena tadā sahasrāṇyaparādhināṃ hi /
T01bsu016_u:6894: dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ kṛpayā parītastān vipramokṣāya nṛpaṃ yayāce // 17 //
T01bsu016_u:6895: śrutvā nṛpo 'mātyagaṇaṃ tadānīmāhūya teṣāṃ nikhilaṃ tadāha /
T01bsu016_u:6896: te procurenaṃ praṇipatya sarve tvaddhātanāyaiṣa nṛpa prayogaḥ // 18 //
T01bsu016_u:6899: śrutvā vadhotsṛṣṭamathāsya mātā sāntaḥpurārtā nṛpatiṃ yayāce /
T01bsu016_u:6900: muñcārdhamāsaṃ nṛpate kumāraṃ dātuṃ pradānānyakhilāni loke // 20 //
T01bsu016_u:6901: dattābhyanujñaśca nṛpeṇa tena prādātsa dānāni yathocitāni /
T01bsu016_u:6903: pāṣaṇḍināṃ yasya yadīpsitaṃ tat tasmai dadāti sma vadhāya sajjaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6904: muktārtanādātha vinirjagāma sā rājadhānyā janatā samagrā // 22 //
T01bsu016_u:6906: pakvāni jñātvā jagadindriyāṇi taṃ yajñavāṭaṃ kṛpayā jagāma // 23 //
T01bsu016_u:6908: upetya tasyāṃ pariṣadyathāsau tathāgatavyūhavikurvitena dharmapradīpāmbudadharmaghoṣasūtrāntarājaṃ sugato babhāṣe // 24 //
T01bsu016_u:6909: anantamadhyāṃ janatāṃ vinīya sa vyākaroti sma tadāgrabodhau /
T01bsu016_u:6911: ārāgya buddhaṃ vipulaṃ ca tasmai vidhāya pūjāṃ mudito babhāṣe /
T01bsu016_u:6912: dvīpo bhaveyaṃ jagatāṃ vinetā trāṇaṃ śaraṇyaśca parāyaṇaṃ ca // 26 //
T01bsu016_u:6913: sa prāvrajattasya muneḥ samīpe saṃbodhimārgaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6914: dharmasvabhāvaṃ suparīkṣamāṇo yatra sthitaḥ kalpaśatāni cīrṇaḥ // 27 //
T01bsu016_u:6916: saṃbodhimārgaṃ paribhāvayitvā labhate tadānīṃ sa vimokṣametam // 28 //
T01bsu016_u:6917: ye tatra kalpe sugatā babhūvurārāgya tānapyakhilān prasannaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6918: pūjāṃ ca teṣāmakarodudārāṃ saṃdhārayāmāsa ca dharmacakram // 29 //
T01bsu016_u:6921: ahaṃ sa āsaṃ vijitāvināmā dṛṣṭvā narāṃścārakabandhanasthān /
T01bsu016_u:6922: tadvipramokṣāya visṛjya dehaṃ labdho mamāyaṃ hi tadā vimokṣaḥ // 31 //
T01bsu016_u:6926: dṛṣṭāśca me kecana ye munīndrāḥ prāptaśca yaṃ me nikhileṣvavāptaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6930: kṣetrāṇi sarvāṇyapi sarvadikṣu spharanti kāyena asajjamānāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:6933: vidarśayantyeva ca te jineṣu svakāyameghān pratibimbabhūtāḥ // 36 //
T01bsu016_u:6935: vyūhānaśeṣānabhivarṣamāṇāḥ pūjāṃ prakurvanti ca te jinānām // 37 //
T01bsu016_u:6938: sarvāsvaśeṣāsu ca dikṣu yānti cakṣuṣpathe te jinamaṇḍaleṣu /
T01bsu016_u:6948: yatra pratiṣṭhāya caranti caryāṃ kṣetreṣu sarveṣvaparāntakalpān // 43 //
T01bsu016_u:6954: acchambhi te varṇamahāsamudrān vimokṣametaṃ pratilabhya śāntam // 46 //
T01bsu016_u:6956: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvalokagatisamatikrāntānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvalokopapattipratibhāsaprāptānāṃ (Gv 284)
T01bsu016_u:6957: sarvajñajñānāvaraṇaparvatavikiraṇaprayuktānāṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇapratividdhānāṃ sarvakleśāvaraṇāndhakāravidhamanaprayuktānāṃ sarvadharmapravicāraṇābhinirhārakuśalamūlānāṃ nirātmadharmajñānapratyakṣāṇāṃ sarvasattvaparipākavinayāpratiprasrabdhānāmadvayadharmadhātunayasupratibiddhānāṃ sarvavākpathanayasāgarānuprasṛtabuddhīnāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇasamudrān vā avatartuṃ jñānavikramo parijñātuṃ cintāvasthānaṃ vā prajñātuṃ
T01bsu016_u:6961: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakule?
T01bsu016_u:6962: kathamālokakarā bhavanti lokānām? kathamaparāntakoṭīgatān kalpān bodhisattvasaṃcārikāṃ caranto na parikhidyante?
T01bsu016_u:6963: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ rātridevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvya vanditvā namaskṛtya prāñjalīkṛto 'valokayamānaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ // 39 //
T01bsu016_u:6966: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāstāmanuśāsanīmanusmaran taṃ sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ paribhāvayan vipulīkurvan anupūrveṇa yena lumbinīvanaṃ tenopajagāma /
T01bsu016_u:6967: upetya lumbinīvanaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāṃ parigaveṣamāṇo
T01bsu016_u:6968: lumbinīdevatāṃ lumbinīvaneṣu sarvaratnadrumaśākhāmaṇḍalakūṭāgāre maṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇāṃ viṃśatyā vanadevatāniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtāṃ puraskṛtāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāṃ sarvabodhisattvajanmasamudranirdeśaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāṃ tathāgatagotrābhijātānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ guṇasamudravegavivardhanām dṛṣṭvā ca yena sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā tenopajagāma /
T01bsu016_u:6969: upetya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīlumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā devate anuttarāyāṃ
T01bsu016_u:6971: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakule, kathaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carantaḥ
T01bsu016_u:6973: evamukte sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - daśemāni kulaputra bodhisattvajanmāni yaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakuleṣu /
T01bsu016_u:6974: niryātā bodhisattvāḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ bodhisattvakuśalairvivardhante, na vitiṣṭhante na
T01bsu016_u:6975: viṣīdanti na vivartante na pratiprasrabhyante na parikhidyante na saṃsīdanti na muhyanti nāvalīyante na paritrasyanti na praṇaśyanti /
T01bsu016_u:6998: tatra kulaputra katamatsarvabuddhopasthānapraṇidhiprayogagarbhaṃ nāma prathamaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva buddhopasthānāya prapūjyate sarvabuddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvan gurukurvan
T01bsu016_u:6999: mānayan pūjayan upatiṣṭhan ārāgayan avirāgayan tathāgatadarśanāvitṛpto
T01bsu016_u:7004: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhapūjopasthānapraṇidhiprayogagarbhaṃ nāma prathamaṃ bodhisattvajanma sarvajñatāsaṃbhārakuśalamūlasaṃbhavasamārjanatāyai saṃvartate //
T01bsu016_u:7005: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhicittāṅgapariniṣpattisaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ
T01bsu016_u:7018: idaṃ kulaputra bodhicittāṅgapariniṣpattisaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ bodhisattvajanma //
T01bsu016_u:7023: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tryadhvalokādhyāśayaviśuddhigarbhaṃ nāma caturthaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ pariśuddho bhavatyadhyāśayadhātau /
T01bsu016_u:7034: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tryadhvalokādhyāśayaviśuddhigarbhaṃ nāma caturthaṃ bodhisattvajanma
T01bsu016_u:7036: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ samantāvabhāsaprabhāgarbhaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ prayogasaṃpanno bhavati sarvajagatparipākavinayapratipannaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7046: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ samantāvabhāsaprabhāgarbhaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ bodhisattvajanma tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ sarvatathāgatakulagotrasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvo jāto bhavati tathāgatakule 'nujāto bhavati,
T01bsu016_u:7054: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ sarvatathāgatakulagotrasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvajanma
T01bsu016_u:7055: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabalāvabhāsālokālaṃkāragarbhaṃ nāma saptamaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvo buddhabalapraveśāvabhāse na nivartate
T01bsu016_u:7065: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabalāvabhāsālokālaṃkāragarbhaṃ nāma saptamaṃ bodhisattvajanma
T01bsu016_u:7066: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ samantajñānamukhavyavacārapariniṣpattisaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāmāṣṭamaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ kumārabhūta eva bodhisattvavyavasthānavyavasthito bhavati, yatra pratiṣṭhāya sarvajñajñānanayaṃ vyavacārayati /
T01bsu016_u:7075: aprameyāṃ ca dharmatāṃ parīttāṃ mahadgatāṃ vā pratividhyati /
T01bsu016_u:7079: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ dharmadhātunirmāṇavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe nānāvyūhāni buddhakṣetrāṇi adhitiṣṭhati sattvanirmāṇe vaiśāradyaparamapāramitāprāptaśca bhavati /
T01bsu016_u:7090: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ dharmadhātunirmāṇavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma navamaṃ bodhisattvajanma
T01bsu016_u:7091: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabhūmyākramaṇavegagarbhaṃ nāma daśamaṃ bodhisattvajanma? iha kulaputra bodhisattvo vivikto bhavati sarvatryadhvatathāgataikībhāvaviṣaye /
T01bsu016_u:7097: sarvakalpasaṃvartavivartakalpānāṃ ca pūrvāntāparāntapratyuatpannānāṃ sanāmnāṃ sopadeśānāmānantaryaṃ prajānāti /
T01bsu016_u:7100: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabhūmyākramaṇavegagarbhaṃ nāma daśamaṃ bodhisattvajanma
T01bsu016_u:7101: imāni kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ daśa bodhisattvajanmāni yeṣu bodhisattvā jāyante upapadyante samarjayanti saṃvardhayanti pratipūrayanti saṃbhavanti parisaṃbhavanti pariniṣpadyante /
T01bsu016_u:7112: atha khalu sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva bodhisattvajanmārthamabhidyotayantī buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
T01bsu016_u:7113: adhyāśayena vimalena anāvilena paśyanti ye jina na jātu bhavanti tṛptāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7114: sarvān jināna aparāntaviyūhameghān praṇidhyenti te prathamajanmasthitāḥ sumedhāḥ // 1 //
T01bsu016_u:7115: sarvatriyadhvagamaśeṣa spharitva lokaṃ kṣetrāṇi sarva tatha dharma tathaiva buddhān /
T01bsu016_u:7117: ye dharmamegha pibamāna na jātu tṛptāḥ nidhyaptimānasa triyadhvaasaṅgakāyāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7118: ākāśadhātuvimalā samacittakāyāḥ janmaṃ tṛtīyamidamapratimaṃ hi teṣām // 3
T01bsu016_u:7120: sarvajñatānayasamudra viśāhamānāḥ teṣāṃ caturthamiha janma nararṣabhāṇām
T01bsu016_u:7121: ye maitrayā daśasu dikṣu jagatspharitvā abhinirharantyamalapāramitāsamudrān /
T01bsu016_u:7122: paripācayanti jagu dharmaprabhābhiranta imu janmu pañcamu mahāpuruṣāṇa teṣām // 5 //
T01bsu016_u:7124: ye dharmadhātunayasāgaramotaranti ṣaṣṭhaṃ idaṃ vipula janma vidūna teṣām // 6 //
T01bsu016_u:7125: ye dharmakāya pariśuddha asaṅgacittāḥ kṣetrāṇyaśeṣatu spharitva svakaiḥ śarīraiḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7129: sarvaṃ samādhinayasāgara otaranti janmāṣṭamaṃ matamidaṃ tathatāśrayāṇām //
T01bsu016_u:7131: bauddhā vikurvitaviyūha vidarśayanti teṣāmidaṃ navamu janma mahāśayānām //
T01bsu016_u:7132: ye te yathābala jināna tathā praviṣṭāḥ sarvajñatāvipulavegavivardhamānāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7134: ebhiḥ kulaputra bodhisattvo daśabhirjanmabhistathāgatakule jāta evamālokakaro bhavati sarvasattvānām
T01bsu016_u:7135: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ahamaprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
T01bsu016_u:7137: aprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ? āha - ahaṃ kulaputra sarvabodhisattvajanmasaṃdarśanopasaṃkramaṇapraṇidhānapariniṣpannā sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya vipulaṃ janmasamudramavatarāmi
T01bsu016_u:7138: / yaduta asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau bodhisattvajanma avataramāṇā bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmiha jambudvīpe lumbinīvane bodhisattvajanmasaṃdarśane pūrvapraṇidhānopapannā sā ahamiha bodhisattvajanmānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayamānā viharāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7149: punaḥ sarvamidaṃ lumbinīvanaṃ divyasamatikrāntagandhāṅkuraprarūḍhaṃ sarvacūrṇakośasaṃbhūtaṃ sarvadhvajameghapaṭalamaṇḍalajātaṃ gandhamaṇivigrahavṛkṣamūlaparisaṃsthāpitālaṃkāraṃ samavāsthiṣata idaṃ caturthaṃ pūrvanimittaṃ prādurabhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7152: (Gv 291) punaḥ sarvasminniha lumbinīvane sarvavṛkṣeṣu mahāmaṇiratnakośā abhinirvṛttāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7154: punaḥ sarvasminniha lumbinīvane sarvanalinīṣu sarvāṇi jalajaratnapuṣpāṇi śuṅgībhūtāni dharaṇitalādabhyudgamya vārisamudgatāni samavāsthiṣanta /
T01bsu016_u:7156: punaryāvanta iha lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā lokendrajagadindrā vā, te 'pyasmin lumbinīvane sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sthitā abhūvan /
T01bsu016_u:7158: punaryāvanta iha cāturdvīpikāyāṃ lokadhātau devakanyā vā nāgakanyā vā yakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragakanyā vā, tāḥ sarvāḥ pramuditamānasāḥ sarvapūjāvidhiparigṛhītahastāḥ plakṣaśākhābhimukhāḥ
T01bsu016_u:7161: punardaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ nābhimaṇḍalebhyo niścaramāṇā bodhisattvajanmavikurvitapradīpā nāma raśmayo niścaritvā sarvamidaṃ lumbinīvanamavabhāsya tiṣṭhanti sma /
T01bsu016_u:7162: teṣu ca sarvaraśmimukhamaṇḍaleṣu teṣāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ janmavikurvitāni pratibhāsaprāptāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu016_u:7163: saṃprasavavikurvitāḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇāśca buddhasvarasaṃprayuktāstebhyo raśmimukhamaṇḍalebhyo niścaramāṇāḥ śrūyante sma /
T01bsu016_u:7165: imāni daśa pūrvanimittāni prādurbhūtāni bodhisattvajanmakālasamaye pratyupasthite, yeṣāṃ prādurbhāvādvitarkamabhavat sarvalokendrāṇāṃ bodhisattvo janiṣyata iti /
T01bsu016_u:7166: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra eṣāṃ daśānāṃ pūrvanimittānāṃ darśanādacintyaṃ prītivegaṃ pratilabhe
T01bsu016_u:7167: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyādevyāḥ kapilavastuno mahānagarānniṣkramantyā iha lumbinīvane daśa mahāvabhāsapūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan, yeṣāṃ prādurbhāvādaprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvajñatādharmālokaprītivegā vivardhitāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7168: katame daśa? yaduta - dharaṇītalagateṣu sarvaratnakūṭāgāragarbheṣvavabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7170: aśeṣaratnapadmamukuleṣu vikasamāneṣu sarvapatrebhyo 'vabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ, madhuraśca sujātajātaśabda ebhyo niścarati sma /
T01bsu016_u:7180: yaśca daśasu dikṣu sarvabodhisattvānāṃ paripākavinayajñānālokāvabhāsaḥ, sa iha lumbinīvane prādurbabhūva /
T01bsu016_u:7189: tatra kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ plakṣadrumanilayagatāyāḥ saṃnipatitānāṃ sarvalokendrāṇāṃ sarvakāmadhātukānāṃ ca devaputrāṇāṃ sāpsarogaṇadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃnipatitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ nirāmagandhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ saparivārāṇāṃ saṃnipatitānāṃ bodhisattvapūjāsaṃprayuktānāṃ māyādevyāstejasā śriyā varṇena rūpeṇa sarvapūjāvyūhāḥ kāyāścāvabhāsitā babhūvuḥ, asyāṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāḥ prabhāḥ, tā api sarvā
T01bsu016_u:7191: sarvaromavivaravisṛtāśca māyādevyāḥ prabhāvabhāsāstadanyābhiḥ prabhābhiranupahatā anāvṛtā apravyāhṛtā asaṅgāḥ sarvadiśaḥ spharitvā sarvāṇi nairayikāṇi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi tairyagyonikāni duḥkhāni sarvāṇi ca yāmalaukikāni duḥkhāni sarvabhavagatiparyāpannānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni saṃkleśāṃśca praśamayitvā tiṣṭhanti bhāsante
T01bsu016_u:7193: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane prathamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
T01bsu016_u:7194: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yasmin samaye māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣau sarvāvatīyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrā lokadhāturantargatā pratibhāsaprāptā saṃdṛśyate sma,
T01bsu016_u:7195: tasyāṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau koṭīśatacāturdvīpikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ sarve jambudvīpeṣu nānānāmadheyāsu rājadhānīṣu nānānāmadheyeṣu vanaṣaṇḍeṣu nānāvṛkṣamūleṣu māyādevī upagatā evameva
T01bsu016_u:7196: saṃdṛśyate sma sarvalokendraparivṛtā bodhisattvajanmapratyupasthānā acintyena bodhisattvajananījñānavikurvitena
T01bsu016_u:7197: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane dvitīyaṃ janmavikurvitam //
T01bsu016_u:7198: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhya ekaikasmādromamukhādyāvanto bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitāḥ, te sarve saṃdṛśyante
T01bsu016_u:7200: yaśca taistathāgatairdharmo deśitaḥ, sa sarvastebhyo romavivarebhyo
T01bsu016_u:7202: tadyathāpi nāma vārirāśe rajasi kanakaparamāṇurajasi vā ādarśamaṇḍale vā svacche suprasanne vā udake gaganamaṇḍalamādityacandrajyotigrahagaṇapratimaṇḍitaṃ gambhīrameghapaṭalanigarjitanirghoṣapratibhāsaprāptaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma,
T01bsu016_u:7203: evameva kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromamukhamaṇḍaleṣu pūrvatathāgatavikurvitāni saṃdṛśyante sma sarvadharmadeśanānirghoṣāṇi /
T01bsu016_u:7204: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane tṛtīyaṃ janmavikurvitam //
T01bsu016_u:7205: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvakāyātsarvaromamukhamaṇḍalebhya ekaikasmādromavivarādyāvatsu sarvakṣetreṣu yāvatsu lokadhātusamudreṣu yāvatsu lokadhātuvaṃśeṣu yāvatsu lokadhātusaṃjñāgateṣu bhagavān bodhisattvacārikāmakārṣīt /
T01bsu016_u:7206: yatpratiṣṭhāneṣu kṣetreṣu yatsaṃsthāneṣu yadvyūheṣu yaccharīreṣu yatparvatālaṃkāreṣu yadgrāmanagaranigamajanapadapaṭṭanālaṃkāreṣu yadudyānanadīhṛdataḍāgasāgarālaṃkāreṣu yadgaganameghālaṃkāreṣu yatsattvanilayeṣu yadyānanirdeśeṣu yatkalpanāmasaṃkhyāsu yadbuddhotpādaprabhaveṣu yadviśuddhiparameṣu yathāyuḥpramāṇasattveṣu yathālokajanmopapattiṣu yathāsattvasamavadhāneṣu yathākalyāṇamitrasaṃniśrayeṣu yathākuśaladharmaprayogeṣu yathādharmapratipatyabhiyogeṣu (Gv 293) buddhakṣetreṣu
T01bsu016_u:7207: bodhisattvacārikāmacaran, te sarve buddhakṣetraprasarā māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromamukhebhyaḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu016_u:7210: yairākārairyairvihārairyaiḥ paribhogairyaiḥ sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedībhiryeṣu jātiparivarteṣu, tatsarvamekaikasmin romavivare saṃdṛśyate sma /
T01bsu016_u:7211: sarveṣu ca teṣu tāsu tāsūpapattiṣu māyādevī bodhisattvasya jananī babhūva /
T01bsu016_u:7212: sarve ca te bodhisattvakāyā māyāyā devyā romavivareṣu vikurvitapratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu016_u:7213: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane caturthaṃ janmavikurvitam //
T01bsu016_u:7214: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvadbhiḥ kāyairbhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāmacarat
T01bsu016_u:7216: te sarve māyāyā devyāḥ kāye sarvaromamukheṣu pratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu016_u:7217: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya pañcamaṃ janmavikurvitam
T01bsu016_u:7218: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvanto bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caratā duṣkaraparityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ, hastapādaparityāgā vā karṇanāsāparityāgā vā jihvādaṃṣṭrāparityāgā vā nayanottamāṅgaparityāgā vā māṃsaśoṇitaparityāgā
T01bsu016_u:7219: vā asthimajjāparityāgā vā vakṣohṛdayaparityāgā vā chavicarmaparityāgā vā bāhyādhyātmikavastuparityāgā vā putraduhitṛbhāryāparityāgā vā ātmabhāvaparityāgā vā bhogaratnaparityāgā vā grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīparityāgā vā dhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraparityāgā vā maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajataparityāgā vā vividharatnābharaṇaparityāgā vā śayyāsanaparityāgā vā gṛhavimānaparityāgā vā sarvopabhogaparityāgā vā, te ca dāyakabodhisattvavigrahakāyai rūpaiḥ parityajanti sma /
T01bsu016_u:7220: te ca pratigrāhakāyai rūpaiḥ pratigṛhṇanti sma /
T01bsu016_u:7221: tāni ca deśavastūni yāni parityaktāni, te ca deśapradeśāḥ, te ca bodhisattvaparivārāḥ, sarve te māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhyaḥ pratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
T01bsu016_u:7222: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya ṣaṣṭhaṃ janmavikurvitam //
T01bsu016_u:7223: punaraparaṃ kulaputra ....................... lumbinīvanaṣaṇḍe samavasṛtā abhijātajagadvijñānā prādurabhavat /
T01bsu016_u:7224: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya saptamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
T01bsu016_u:7225: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvantaḥ sarvadevendrabhavanavyūhaparibhogasamatikrāntāḥ sarvanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyendrabhavanavyūhaparibhogasamatikrāntāḥ sarvabodhisattvaparibhogāḥ, yaduta sarvamaṇirājakūṭāgāraparibhogā vā
T01bsu016_u:7226: maṇirājavimānaparibhogā vā maṇirājajālaparibhogā vā maṇirājavigrahaparibhogā vā maṇirājabimbaparibhogā vā maṇirājavyūhā vā sarvābharaṇaparibhogā vā sarvagandharājaparibhogā vā śubhāpratikūlasarvārambaṇaparibhogā vā, te sarve māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣeranyonyāsaṃbhinnā niścaritvā iha lumbinīvane samantavyūhāḥ
T01bsu016_u:7230: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣeḥ prathamataraṃ daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvā bhagavato vairocanasya sadṛśarūpavarṇasaṃsthānāḥ sadṛśalakṣaṇānuvyañjanālaṃkārāḥ sadṛśaprabhāḥ sadṛśaraśmipramuñcanāḥ sadṛśaliṅgalīlāḥ sadṛśavikramāḥ sadṛśavirocanavikurvitāḥ sadṛśaparivārāḥ sadṛśavyūhā niścaranti sma bhagavato varṇasamudrānudīrayamāṇāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7231: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya navamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
T01bsu016_u:7232: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pravṛtte māyāyā devyāḥ purastādadho vajratalānmahāpṛthivīmabhinirbhidya sarvaratnavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnapadmamabhyudgatamabhūdaparājitamahāvajramaṇirājagarbhasarvamaṇirājakesararaśmivyūhaṃ daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamapatrapaṅktisuvibhaktaṃ vividhamaṇirājapatramaṇḍalaṃ cintāmaṇirājaviśuddhakarṇikaṃ sarvaratnavarṇāprameyakesarapaṅktivyūham,
T01bsu016_u:7235: / idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya daśamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
T01bsu016_u:7236: imāni kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya daśa janmavikurvitāni prādurabhūvan /
T01bsu016_u:7238: sūryamaṇḍalamiva gaganatalāt, vidyutkalāpa iva meghasaṃghātāt, sāṃdhya iva mahāghanaḥ śailaśikharāntarāt, mahāpradīpa iva tamo 'ndhakārāt /
T01bsu016_u:7239: ityevaṃ bodhisattvo māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣerabhiniṣkramaṇaṃ saṃdarśayāmāsa māyāgatarūpavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā anāgatadharmatayā anutpādānirodhalokavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā //
T01bsu016_u:7240: ityevamahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi iha lumbinīvane viharamāṇā /
T01bsu016_u:7241: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra syāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya
T01bsu016_u:7244: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya koṭīśataṃ janmavikurvitānāmavatarāmi, evaṃ sarvatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparyāpannaparamāṇurajontargateṣu sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥpraveśajñānānugateṣu praticittakṣaṇamekaikena cittapraveśena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitānyavatarāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7245: tadanantareṇa cittena buddhakṣetrasahasraparamāṇurajontargateṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ekaikatra buddhatatsamānyeva bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7246: etena nayena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajontargateṣu (Gv 295) buddhakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvāṇi bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi, na ca paryantamupaimi /
T01bsu016_u:7247: sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi buddhakṣetraparaṃparāṇāṃ na ca paryantamupaimi sarvakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre buddhasattvajanmaparaṃparāṇām /
T01bsu016_u:7249: bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi, tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyāsu lokadhātuṣu sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu praticittakṣaṇamekaikena cittapraveśena sarvākārāṇi sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmyapratiprasrabdhyadhiṣṭhānayogena evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāmevamāha kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyaṃ devate aprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitaṃ saṃdarśayamāno
T01bsu016_u:7251: buddhakṣetrakoṭīparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa parataramīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
T01bsu016_u:7252: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau samāpadyate kalpe 'śītibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprabhave /
T01bsu016_u:7253: tasyāṃ khalu kulaputra samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau vicitravyūhaprabhā nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikābhūt
T01bsu016_u:7254: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya meruviśuddhavyūhadhvajā nāma rājadhānyabhūt
T01bsu016_u:7255: tasyāṃ khalu rājadhānyāṃ ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7256: rājñaḥ khalu kulaputra ratnārcinetraprabhasya rājñaḥ suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma bhāryābhūt
T01bsu016_u:7257: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra asyāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmiha jambudvīpe māyādevī bhagavato vairocanasya janetrī, evameva kulaputra tena kālena tena samayena tasyāṃ vicitravyūhaprabhāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ jambudvīpe suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma tasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya
T01bsu016_u:7259: yathā teṣāmaśītibuddhakoṭīniyutānāṃ pūrvaṃgamasya prāthamakalpikasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya tathāgatasya mātā abhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7260: sā khalu kulaputra suharṣitaprabheśvarā devī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye viṃśatyā strīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ suvarṇapuṣpābhamaṇḍalaṃ nāma mahodyānaṃ niryayau, yatra tamīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajaṃ kumāraṃ janayāmāsa acintyena bodhisattvavikurvitena /
T01bsu016_u:7261: tena khalu punaḥ samayena suvarṇapuṣpābhamaṇḍalasya nāma mahodyānasya madhye śubharatnavicitrakūṭaṃ nāma kūṭāgāramabhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7262: tasmin kūṭāgāre sarvakāmaṃdadavṛkṣaśākhāmadhyālambatayā suharṣitaprabheśvarāyā devyāḥ sa bhagavānīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajastathāgato janitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7263: tena khalu samayena tasya bhagavato janmakāle vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma dhātrī pratyupasthitābhūt
T01bsu016_u:7264: jātamātraṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ lokendrā vicitrasurabhimanojñadivyapuṣpotkarodgāribhiḥ paramasurabhigandhodakakalaśairvisnāpya tadarhābhiśca acintyāsaṃkhyeyābhiruttamābhiḥ pūjābhirabhipūjya tasyā
T01bsu016_u:7266: parigṛhītamātre ca tasmin bodhisattve tayā dhātryā ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāmaṃse ca, tatkṣaṇameva sā dhātrī mahāprītiprāmodyavegapratilabdhā samantacakṣurviṣayaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ pratyalabhata, yasya samādheḥ (Gv 296)
T01bsu016_u:7268: eṣa ca aprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśano bodhisattvavimokṣo 'vakrāntaḥ susūkṣmaḥ tadyathāpi nāma taddivasāvakrānte mātuḥ kukṣau garbhavijñānam, yasya vimokṣasya pratilambhādanayā
T01bsu016_u:7270: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena
T01bsu016_u:7271: vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma bodhisattvadhātryabhūt? na khalu punastvayā evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T01bsu016_u:7272: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma bodhisattvadhātryabhūvam /
T01bsu016_u:7273: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyāni tena kālena
T01bsu016_u:7274: tena samayena viṃśatistrīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T01bsu016_u:7275: imāni tāni viṃśatidevatāniyutaśatasahasrāṇi, yānīha lumbinīvane prativasanti mama parivārāḥ
T01bsu016_u:7276: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena supraharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma devyabhūdīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya kumārasya janetrī? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
T01bsu016_u:7277: iyaṃ sā māyādevī tena kālena tena samayena supraharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma devyabhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7278: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7280: ayaṃ sa rājā śuddhodanaḥ tena kālena tena samayen ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7281: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya sarvacittakṣaṇeṣvavirahitā abhūvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya bodhisattvajanmavikurvitasāgarāvataraṇatayā sattvanayavṛṣabhitāvikurvitasāgarāvataraṇatayā yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya mahāpraṇidhānasamudrasāgarasaṃbhavānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvacittakṣaṇeṣu sarvaparamāṇurajaḥpraveśasamavasṛtena jñānacakṣuṣā sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu
T01bsu016_u:7284: tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvacittakṣaṇeṣu bodhisattvajanmavikurvitasāgarānavatarāmi
T01bsu016_u:7285: yathā ca asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaparamāṇurajaḥprasaraparaṃparāvatāreṇa samyaksaṃbuddhabodhisattvajanmābhimukhībhāvagatān buddhaguṇānavatarāmi,
T01bsu016_u:7292: atha khalu sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā evamevāprameyasarvakalpasarvāvaraṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ paridīpayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu016_u:7293: buddhaputra śṛṇu mahya bhāṣitaṃ yasmi pṛcchasi janitva gauravam /
T01bsu016_u:7297: kalpa ādiriva ananta nāyako yatrāśītinayutā jinānabhūt // 2 //
T01bsu016_u:7299: jānamāna maya draṣṭu nāyakaḥ svarṇapuṣpaprabhave vanottame // 3 //
T01bsu016_u:7300: nāmato vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā tasya āsi ahu dhātri paṇḍitā /
T01bsu016_u:7301: lokapāla mama aṃsi taṃ sthapī jātamātra kanakottamaprabham // 4 //
T01bsu016_u:7302: aṃsi taṃ grahiya agrapudgalaṃ mūrdhnimasya na prabhomi prekṣitum /
T01bsu016_u:7303: * * * * taṃ acintiyaṃ prekṣamāṇa na ca antu paśyami // 5 //
T01bsu016_u:7304: lakṣaṇebhi pratimaṇḍitaṃ śubhaṃ kāyamasya vimalaṃ sudarśanam /
T01bsu016_u:7305: dṛṣṭa me ratanabimbasādṛśaṃ prītivega atulā vivardhitāḥ // 6 //
T01bsu016_u:7306: cintayitva guṇa tasya me 'mitān puṇyasāgara ameya vardhitāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7307: dṛṣṭva tasya ca vikurvitodadhīn bodhicittavipulaṃ mi saṃbhutam // 7 //
T01bsu016_u:7313: śrutva dharmamatha tasya tāyino labdhimaṃ varavimokṣamaṇḍalam /
T01bsu016_u:7315: yeṣu yāntakupapanna nāyakā te aśeṣa mayi sarvi pūjitāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7316: śāsanaṃ ca maya teṣu dhāritaṃ śodhanā imu vimokṣasāgaram // 11 //
T01bsu016_u:7319: buddhakṣetri raja yāvato iho tān rajāgraprasarābdhi paśyatī /
T01bsu016_u:7320: ekameki raji kṣetrasāgarān pūrva śodhita jinena paśyatī // 13 //
T01bsu016_u:7321: teṣu kṣetraprasareṣu nāyakān jāyato vanavareṣu paśyami /
T01bsu016_u:7323: paśyami kvaci ca kṣetri nāyakān prārthayanta varabodhimuttamām /
T01bsu016_u:7330: janma yātuka jināna paśyami prekṣamāṇa raji kṣetrasāgarān /
T01bsu016_u:7331: janmi janmi bahukāyakoṭibhiḥ pūji teṣa karuṇāmupāgami // 18 //
T01bsu016_u:7333: teṣu sarvajagadāmukhā ahaṃ dharmamegha vipulān pravarṣami // 19 //
T01bsu016_u:7335: kalpakoṭinayutairacintiyairyaṃ na śakya ayu sarva darśitum // 20 //
T01bsu016_u:7337: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvakalpaprasthānagarbhasaṃbhūtacittānāṃ sarvadharmanayanidhyaptijātinidarśakānāṃ sarvatathāgatapūjāpraṇidhisaṃbhūtāśayānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmābhisaṃbodhipraṇidhiparamāṇāṃ sarvakulagotropapattigatisaṃdarśanapratibhāsakalpānāṃ sarvatathāgatapādamūlapadmagarbhopapattīnāṃ sarvajagatparipākakālābhijñānāṃ sarvavinayābhimukhajanmopapattivikurvitasaṃdarśakānāṃ sarvakṣetraprasaravikurvitameghasaṃdarśakānāṃ sarvajagadgatijātikulapratibhāsaprāptānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
T01bsu016_u:7338: gaccha kulaputra, iyamihaiva kapilavastuni mahānagare gopā nāma śākyakanyā
T01bsu016_u:7340: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvaparipākāya saṃsāre saṃsaritavyam
T01bsu016_u:7341: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ // 40 //
T01bsu016_u:7344: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyā antikādapakramya yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya etamevāprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhāvayan avataran vipulīkurvan anutiṣṭhan uttāpayan
T01bsu016_u:7345: parijayan paricintayan pravicinvan anupūrveṇa yena dharmadhātupratibhāsaprabho bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādastenopasaṃkrāmat
T01bsu016_u:7346: tasyopasaṃkramaṇasya aśokaśrīrnāma bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā daśabhirgṛhadevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ pratyudgamya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - svāgataṃ te mahāpuruṣa mahāprajñājñānavikrāmin acintyabodhisattvavimokṣabhāvanādhyālambanapraṇidhicittavipuladharmavimānagocaracārin dharmanagarābhimukha anantabodhisattvopāyanayāvatāraṇāpratiprasrabdhatathāgataguṇasāgarāvabhāsapratilabdha sarvajagadvinayapratibhāsapratibhānajñānābhimukhasarvasattvacaryājñānakāyamantrānuvartana caryābhimukhacitta sarvajagadvedanāprītisamudravegavivardhanapraṇidhāna
T01bsu016_u:7350: lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapratimaṇḍitena kāyena daśabalajñānālokālaṃkṛtena cittena lokaṃ vicariṣyasi
T01bsu016_u:7351: yādṛśīṃ ca te dṛḍhavīryaparākramatāṃ paśyāmi, nacireṇa tvaṃ sarvatryadhvatathāgatasaṃmukhībhāvadarśanasamaṅgī
T01bsu016_u:7353: tathā hi tvaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇadarśanaparyupāsanānuśāsanīḥ saṃpratīcchaṃstadguṇapratinayeṣu prayujyamāno na parikhidyase, na
T01bsu016_u:7355: na ca te kaścidantarāyo vā āvaraṇaṃ vā nivaraṇaṃ vā prasahate, mārā vā mārakāyikā vā devatāḥ
T01bsu016_u:7356: tena acirādeva tvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prītikaro bhaviṣyasi //
T01bsu016_u:7359: / ahaṃ khalu devate sarvasattvakleśasaṃtāpavyupaśamena paramāṃ prītiṃ
T01bsu016_u:7361: sarvasattvaviṣayakarmavipākavinivartanena sarvasattvasukhasaṃbhavena sarvasattvānavadyakarmapratipattyā paramāṃ prītiṃ vindāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7362: yadā ca devate sattvā vividhaviṣayakarmakleśaprayogākṣiptacittā durgatiṣu prapatanti sugatiṣu vā, vividhāni kāyikacaitasikāni duḥkhadaurmanasyāni pratyanubhavanti,
T01bsu016_u:7364: tadyathāpi nāma devate puruṣasyaikāntatṛṣṇācaritasya ekaputrako bhavet priyo manāpaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7365: sa tasyāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu cchidyamāneṣu ekāntatṛṣṇācaritatvāt paramadurmanāḥ syādanāttamanaskaḥ, evameva devate bodhisattvo
T01bsu016_u:7366: bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sattvān karmakleśavaśena tisṛṣu durgatiṣu patitān dṛṣṭvā durmanā bhavati paramadurmanāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7367: yasmin vā punaḥ samaye sattvāḥ kāyavāṅbhanaḥsucaritasamādanahetoḥ kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke
T01bsu016_u:7369: pratyanubhavanti, paramasukhī tasmin samaye bodhisattvo bhavati sumanā
T01bsu016_u:7371: na khalu punardevate bodhisattvā ātmārthāya sarvajñatāmabhiprārthayante /
T01bsu016_u:7372: na vicitrasaṃsāraratisukhaprabhavanārthaṃ na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ vividharativyūhaprārthanayā saṃjñācittadṛṣṭiviparyāsavaśena na saṃyojanabandhanānuśayaparyavasthānavaśagatāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7377: api tu khalu punardevate bodhisattvā bhavasamudragatānāmaparimitaduḥkhaprapīḍitānāṃ sattvānāmantike mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayitvā sarvajagatsaṃgrahamahāpraṇidhimabhinirharanti /
T01bsu016_u:7378: te mahākaruṇāpraṇidhyabhinirhārabalavegena sattvaparipākavinayaprayuktāḥ saṃsāre bodhisattvacaryāṃ carantaḥ saṃdṛśyante /
T01bsu016_u:7381: te bodhisattvacaryāṃ carantaḥ saṃkliṣṭāni kṣetrāṇi saṃpaśyantaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanapraṇidhimabhinirharanti saṃkliṣṭān kṣetrasāgarān pariśodhayamānāḥ sarvasattvānāmāyatananānātvaṃ saṃpaśyamānāḥ
T01bsu016_u:7384: vikalāyatanānapariśuddhacetasaḥ sarvān saṃpaśyamānāḥ sarvasattvacittacaritāni pariśodhayamānā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto na parikhidyante /
T01bsu016_u:7385: evaṃ hi devate bodhisattvā anantamadhyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto 'parikhinnacittāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7386: evaṃ caranto 'laṃkārabhūtā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya devamanuṣyasaṃpattisaṃjananatayā /
T01bsu016_u:7408: evaṃ khalu devate pratipadyamānā bodhisattvāḥ priyā bhavanti sarvasattvānām //
T01bsu016_u:7409: atha khalu aśokaśrīrbodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā sārdhaṃ tairdaśabhiḥ gṛhadevatāsahasraiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ divyasamatikrāntaiḥ manomayaiḥ puṣpamālyagandhacūrṇavilepanaratnābharaṇavarṣaiḥ pravṛṣya anuparivārya
T01bsu016_u:7420: na niśrayaste loke 'sminna niketo na saṃstavaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7432: atha khalvaśokaśrīrbodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubadhnāti sma dharmakāmatayā /
T01bsu016_u:7433: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako dharmadhātupratibhāsaprabhabodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādamupasaṃkramya anupraviśya samantādanuvilokayāmāsa gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyā darśanakāmaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7436: gṛhāvasanapratibhāsamaṇipadmagarbhāsananiṣaṇṇāṃ strīṇāṃ caturaśītyā sahasraiḥ parivṛtāṃ sarvāsāṃ pārthivakulasaṃbhavānāṃ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāsabhāgakuśalamūlānāṃ pūrvadānasaṃgrahasaṃgṛhītānāṃ ślakṣṇamadhuravacanasamudācārāṇāṃ sarvajñatārthābhimukhasukhasaṃgṛhītānāṃ buddhabodhisattvasamudāgamasamānārthatayā susaṃgṛhītānāṃ mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamaputradāraparigrahasusaṃparigṛhītānāṃ mahāmaitryupetasvadārānuvartanapariśodhitānāṃ pūrvabodhisattvācintyopāyakauśalyapariparipācitānām /
T01bsu016_u:7437: sarvāṇi ca tāni caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇyavaivartikānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bodhisattvapāramitānayāvatīrṇāni sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāsu aparapraṇeyāni sarvagrahavigatacitāni sarvasaṃsārarativiratamānasāni asaṅgadharmadhātunayapariśuddhāni sarvajñatābhimukhacittavegāni (Gv 303)
T01bsu016_u:7438: sarvanivaraṇāvaraṇajālavigatāni sarvāṅgapathasamatikrāntāni dharmakāyasunirmitavicārāṇi sarvalokaparipākavinayābhimukhāni vipulapuṇyasamudrasaṃbhūtacittāni samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānaniryātāni vipulabodhisattvabalavegasaṃvardhitāni jñānasūryamaṇḍalacittapradīpāni //
T01bsu016_u:7439: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena gopā śākyakanyā tenopasaṃkramya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāḥ kramatalayoḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya utthāya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
T01bsu016_u:7440: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti,
T01bsu016_u:7461: evamukte gopā śākyakanyā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yastvaṃ bodhisattvānāmimāmevaṃrūpāṃ caryāṃ dharmatāṃ paripraṣṭavyāṃ manyase, yathāpi tatsamantabhadrapraṇidhānacaryābhimukhasya ayaṃ praśnodāhāraḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7462: tena hi kulaputra śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye buddhānubhāvena /
T01bsu016_u:7463: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā imāmevaṃrūpāmindrajālatalopamāṃ samantajñānaprabhāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrayanti /
T01bsu016_u:7467: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā imāmevaṃrūpāmindrajālatalopamāṃ samantajñānaprabhāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrayanti //
T01bsu016_u:7468: tatra kulaputra avivartyavīryā bodhisattvā etān dharmān pratilabhya akṣayākārābhinirhāreṇa bhāvayanto bahulīkurvantaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇyārāgya daśabhirākārairabhirādhayanti /
T01bsu016_u:7470: sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatānugamena sarvajñatāpraṇidhānāvivartyatayā sarvadharmadhātunayavyavalokanatayā sarvabhavasamudroccalitamānasatayā anālayadharmagaganapraviṣṭānālayatayā sarvabodhisattvapraṇidhānānāvaraṇatayā sarvakṣetrasāgaraprasaraṇatayā (Gv
T01bsu016_u:7473: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā etamevārthanayaṃ saṃdarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu016_u:7476: adhimukti yeṣa vipulā gaganaprakāśā yasyāṃ samosarati sarvatriyadhvalokaḥ
T01bsu016_u:7477: kṣetrāśca sattva tatha dharma tathaiva buddhāsteṣāmiyaṃ cariya jñānaprabhaṃkarāṇām // 12 //
T01bsu016_u:7478: yeṣāśayo gaganakalpa anantamadhyaḥ saṃkleśanirmalatayā paramaṃ viśuddhaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7481: te puṇyasāgaraśarīraviśuddhagarbhā loke caranti na ca lokamalena liptāḥ //
T01bsu016_u:7482: sarvasvarāṅgarutaghoṣanayairjinānāṃ ye dharmagarjita śṛṇonta na yāni tṛptim /
T01bsu016_u:7484: ye te daśaddiśi tathāgata aprameyān sarvatra cittakṣaṇi otari anyamanyān /
T01bsu016_u:7486: paśyanti ye pariṣado vipulā jinānāṃ teṣāṃ samādhinayasāgaramotaranti /
T01bsu016_u:7492: ye te mahākaruṇamaṇḍalajñānasūryā dṛṣṭvā jagadvyasanaprāptamudenti dhīrāḥ
T01bsu016_u:7493: dharmābhayā jagati moha vidhūya teṣāmiyaṃ cari divākarasādṛśānām // 19 //
T01bsu016_u:7494: dṛṣṭvā prajāṃ bhavagatau parivartamānāṃ saṃsārasrotapravilomasthitāḥ sumedhāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7496: te 'tra śikṣita nayehi anantamadhyān kāyān yathāśaya jagatyupadarśayitvā /
T01bsu016_u:7497: pratibhāsabimbasadṛśairapi taiḥ svakāyaiḥ paripācayanti janatāṃ bhavasāgareṣu // 21 //
T01bsu016_u:7498: maitrīnayaiḥ suvipulairjanatāṃ spharitvā nānādhimuktiṣu janeṣu cariṃ vidarśya /
T01bsu016_u:7499: dharmaṃ yathāśaya jagatyabhivarṣamāṇā bodhāya sattvanayutān vinayanti dhīrāḥ // 22 //
T01bsu016_u:7500: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ khalu
T01bsu016_u:7503: sarvabodhisattvasamādhisāgaranayavyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ? āha - etamahaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ samāpannā iha
T01bsu016_u:7505: teṣu ye sattvāḥ sarvagatiparyāpannāḥ, tān prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7506: yāvanti ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ cyutyupapattimukhāni, tāni prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7510: akuśalamapi nairyāṇikamapi anairyāṇikamapi niyatamapi aniyatamapi mithyātvaniyatamapi sānuśayamapi niranuśayamapi kuśalamūlasaṃpannamapi kuśalamūlavipannamapi kuśalamūlaparigṛhītamapi (Gv
T01bsu016_u:7511: 306) akuśalamūlaparigṛhītamapi kuśalākuśalaparigṛhītamapi samudānītakuśalamūlamapi asamudānītapāpadharmamapi eṣāṃ karmasamādānaṃ prajānāmi //
T01bsu016_u:7512: teṣu ca anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu ye buddhā bhagavantaṃ utpannāḥ, teṣāṃ nāmasamudrānavatarāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7513: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prathamacittotpādasamudrānapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7520: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sattvaparipākavinayasamudrānapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7524: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parṣanmaṇḍalavibhaktīrapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7525: teṣu ca parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ye śrāvakāsteṣāṃ niryāṇanayamapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7529: ye ca taistathāgataiḥ sattvāḥ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāstānapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7530: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7531: ye ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ pratyekabodhyadhigamāstānapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7532: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ śāntavihāravikurvitavimokṣamukhāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7533: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vividhavikurvitāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7535: yā ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dharmadeśanā, tāmapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7537: yacca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ tadapi prajānāmi
T01bsu016_u:7538: / ye ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasamudrāstānapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7563: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ nānāsamādhisamudrapratilābhānapi prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7574: yathā ca ahaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ lokadhātau atītavartamānān kalpasamudrān nānāvidhānavatarāmi, evamaparāntaparaṃparāvyavacchinnānanāgatān kalpasamudrān prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7575: yathā ca sahāyāṃ lokadhātau prajānāmi, tathā sahālokadhātusamavasaraṇāsu sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāsu prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7576: yathā ca sahālokadhātusamavasaraṇāsu sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāsu prajānāmi, evaṃ sahālokadhātuparamāṇurajontargatāsvapi sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāsu prajānāmi
T01bsu016_u:7580: yathā ca sahālokadhātudaśadigānantaryasthitāsu sarvalokadhātuṣu prajānāmi, evaṃ sahālokadhātudaśadigānantaryaparaṃparāsthitāsvapi
T01bsu016_u:7584: yathā samantadikprabhāsavairocanalokadhātuvaṃśaparyāpannāsvapi lokadhātuṣu prajānāmi, evaṃ samantadikprabhāsavairocanalokadhātuvaṃśadigānantaryaparaṃparāsthitāsu sarvalokadhātuṣu prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7588: / evaṃ lokadhātunayeṣu lokadhātucakreṣu lokadhātumaṇḍaleṣu lokadhātuvibhāgeṣu lokadhātunadīṣu lokadhātvāvarteṣu lokadhātuparivarteṣu lokadhātusumeruṣu lokadhātusamudgateṣu lokadhātupadmeṣu lokadhātuvṛkṣeṣu lokadhātukhārakeṣu lokadhātusaṃjñāgateṣvapi prajānāmi //
T01bsu016_u:7589: yathā ca asmin kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāre lokadhātusamudre prajānāmi,
T01bsu016_u:7590: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu anantaparyanteṣu dharmadhātuparameṣu ākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣu vairocanasya pūrvapraṇidhānasāgarān prajānāmi avatarāmi anusmarāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7623: ye ca bhagavatā purvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sattvasamudrāḥ paripācitāstānapyavatarāmi
T01bsu016_u:7633: yathā ca bhagavato vairocanasya sarvasmin dharmadhātau bodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi, evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātuparameṣvākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣvasaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātuparameṣvākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣvasaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvacaritapraveśamanantamāyājālapraveśamanantadharmadhātuspharaṇamanantamukhanirdeśamaparyantakalpādhiṣṭhānapraveśanirdeśamavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7634: tatkasya heto? eṣa hi kulaputra asya sarvabodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ, yadetaṃ samāpannā sarvasattvacittacaritanayān prajānāmi sarvasattvakuśalasaṃcayān prajānāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7644: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāṃ śākyakanyāmetadavocat -
T01bsu016_u:7646: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa abhayaṃkarā nāma lokadhāturabhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7647: tasyāṃ khalu lokadhātau gatipravaro nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7648: tasyāḥ khalu punarlokadhātormadhye kṣemāvatī nāma cāturdvīpikā abhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7649: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya drumameruśrīrnāma rājadhānyabhūccaturaśīternagarakoṭīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
T01bsu016_u:7651: tāni caturaśītinagarakoṭīsahasrāṇi pratyekaṃ nīlavaiḍūryabhūmibhāgasaṃsthāpitāni saptaratnamayaprākāraparikṣiptāni vicitravarṇaprabhājālaśubhagandhaśakaṭacakrapramāṇotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannakanakavālikāsaṃstṛtatalagandhodakaparipūrṇasaptaparikhāparikṣiptāni ratnamayasaptavedikājālasaptatālapaṅktiparivṛtāni saptaratnamayavṛkṣamālāparikṣiptāni upari meghajālasaṃchāditāni
T01bsu016_u:7653: teṣāṃ khalu punarmahānagarāṇāṃ sarvaratnavṛkṣahemajālālaṃkārādibhyo vātasaṃghaṭṭitebhyo bahutūryanirghoṣasamarutaniścaritebhyo 'yamevaṃrūpa ānandaśabdo niścarati sma - snāta, pibata, khādata, dharmaṃ carata, bodhicittamutpādayata,
T01bsu016_u:7657: tasyāṃ khalu drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt maṇḍalikaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7660: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ pañca putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ prāsādikānāṃ darśanīyānāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatānāṃ rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma agramahiṣī abhūt teṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ strīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
T01bsu016_u:7666: samaṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ pādatalāvutkṣipati, samaṃ nikṣipati, nikṣipaṃśca sarvāvatpādatalābhyāṃ samaṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ saṃspṛśati /
T01bsu016_u:7667: pādatalayoścāsya cakrāṇi jātāni sahasrārāṇi sanābhīni sanemikāni sarvākāraparipūrṇāni surucirāṇi darśanīyāni /
T01bsu016_u:7670: ubhe cāsya hastapādatale jālinī abhūtāṃ vicitrasuvibhaktācchidrāparisrāviṇī, tadyathā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya
T01bsu016_u:7674: sa tāḥ samaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa, samuddharati sma /
T01bsu016_u:7676: sa tairyān spṛśati striyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā dārakaṃ vā dārikāṃ vā, sarve te prītimanaso 'bhūvan
T01bsu016_u:7679: tasya jaṅghe anupurvasamudgate abhūtāṃ racite vṛtte sujāte eṇeyasyeva mṛgarajñaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7680: nainaṃ kaścitsamartho 'nujavitumanaprāptuṃ vā, na ca vrajan
T01bsu016_u:7683: tasya dvayoḥ pādayordvāvutsadau jātāvabhūtāṃ vṛttau sujātau suparipūrṇāvadṛśyasaṃdhī suracitau darśanīyau, dvau hastayordvāvaṃsakūṭayoḥ pṛṣṭhato grīvāyāmekaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7685: suguptamasya kośabastiguhyamabhūnnimagnaṃ saṃchāditam, tadyathā hastyājāneyasya vā
T01bsu016_u:7687: nāsya kaścitstrī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā vṛddho vā madhyo vā daharo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā nirvasanasyāpyapaśyadanyatra svaparibhogena naimittikena vā kāmopacitena /
T01bsu016_u:7690: citāntarāṃsaḥ khalu punarabhavat sūpacitaśarīraḥ suvibhaktasamucchrayaḥ sarvakāyasamabhāgapratiṣṭhitaḥ anūnagātraḥ anunnatagātro 'pariṇatagātro
T01bsu016_u:7696: 'navanamanenobhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ jānumaṇḍale parimārjati, parāmṛśati samabhāgasthitena śarīreṇa
T01bsu016_u:7697: vṛhadṛjugātramahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarabhavat sarvāvaropetaparamāṇusamagātraḥ praśamagātro gurugātraḥ prasannagātraḥ prahlādagātraḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7699: tasya yāvatyo grīvāsāmantakena mukhasāmantakena ca rasaharaṇyaḥ, tāḥ sarvāḥ samā abhūvan samantāḥ suparipūrṇāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7703: tasya kiṃcidbhaktaparibhogeṣu ekavāramapi mukhabhaktaṃ parivartamānamasaṃbhinnamabhyavahāramagamat antaśa ekodanabindurapi /
T01bsu016_u:7705: aviralā aviṣamā asya dantā abhūvan acchidrasaṃdhayaḥ samāṃ suvibhaktāḥ,
T01bsu016_u:7706: yairasyāhāraṃ paribhuñjānasya nābhūtsaṅgo vā parisaṅgoparudvaṅgo(?) vā upakledo vā abhiṣyando vā paryavanāho vā atisarjanaṃ vā /
T01bsu016_u:7707: samadantatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ khalu punarabhavat samadanto nonadanto nādhikadanto nonnatadanto na saṃnatadanto na saṃbhinnadantaḥ samantamadhyadanto 'nutsannadanto avinirbhinnadantaḥ suśukladaṃṣṭraśca kumāro 'bhūt nirupakleśadaṣṭraḥ suprasannadaṃṣṭraḥ supariśuddhadaṃṣṭraḥ
T01bsu016_u:7711: 311) prabhūtā cāsya jihvā abhūt tanvī mṛdvī sukumārā karmaṇyā kamanīyā
T01bsu016_u:7716: brahmātirekeṇa svareṇa ca parṣanmaṇḍalamatikrāmati, sarvaṃ ca anuravati /
T01bsu016_u:7717: abhinīlanetraśca sa kumāro 'bhūdacchanetraḥ pariśuddhanetraḥ prabhāsvaranetraḥ viprasannanetro 'bhirūpanetro darśanīyanetraḥ suruciranetraḥ prahasitanetraḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7719: 'bhūtpadmarāgasuviśuddhacakṣurāyatanaḥ samanetraraṅgaḥ samasadṛśanetraraṅgaḥ sujātanetraraṅgaḥ āyatanetraraṅgaḥ paripūrṇanetraraṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhitanetraraṅgaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7720: bhruvontare cāsya ūrṇā jātābhūnmṛdvī karmaṇyā sukumārākulasaṃsparśā svacchā śuddhā prabhāsvarā himaguḍikātuṣāravarṇā suśuklaraśmimaṇḍalaprabhāvabhāsā /
T01bsu016_u:7721: murdhni ca asyoṣṇīṣamabhinirvṛttamabhūt sujātaṃ samantaparimaṇḍalaṃ madhyābhinyastakeśālaṃkāraṃ koṭīśatasahasrapatraratnapadmasaṃdarśitaṃ samantātsamabhāgapratiṣṭhitamaparimitamahārdhyatāpradhānamadhyam sūkṣmacchaviśca sa kumāro 'bhūt /
T01bsu016_u:7722: nāsya kāye rajo vā malo vā kledo vā jālaṃ vā valī vā śaithilyaṃ vā bhaṅgo vā prasaraṇaṃ vā visaraṇaṃ vā asamaṃ vā asthiṣata /
T01bsu016_u:7726: ekaikaromasya ekaikasmin romakūpe roma jātamabhūnnīlavaiḍūryavarṇapradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalajātaṃ suparisaṃcitaṃ suniviṣṭaṃ supratiṣṭhitam /
T01bsu016_u:7731: tasya nīlāḥ keśā abhūvan vairocanamaṇiratnanīlavarṇanirbhāsāḥ snigdhā mṛdavaḥ sukuñcitāḥ pradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalinaḥ sujātamūlā anuddhatāḥ niṣpīḍitā asaṃlulitāḥ samasadṛśasthānasaṃsthitāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7732: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punaḥ tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'bhūt samantabhadraparimaṇḍalaḥ samantabhadraḥ samantaprāsādikaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7735: 'pi dakṣiṇato 'pi vāmato 'pi gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo 'pi bhāṣamāṇo
T01bsu016_u:7737: ebhiḥ kulaputra dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtakāyaḥ sa tejodhipatī rājakumāro
T01bsu016_u:7739: sa khalu kulaputra tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'pareṇa samayena pitrābhyanujñāto drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā gandhāṅkuraprabhameghaṃ nāmodyānam, tatra bhūmidarśanāya abhiniryayau viṃśatyā kanyāsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ mahatā puṇyatejautaḥśrīsaubhāgyavikurvitavyūhena naranārīgaṇaiḥ samantādabhinandyamāno jāmbūnadasuvarṇarathamāruhya
T01bsu016_u:7742: vimalāpramāṇaprabheṇa acintyādbhutasarvaratnaviracanābhaktivinyāsacitrasarvākāravyūhopaśobhitena nīlavaidūryamaṇirājodviddhadaṇḍena mahatā ratnacchatreṇa dhriyatā bahuprāṇiśatasahasraparivṛtadivyamadhuramanojñanirdhoṣaistūryaśatasahasraiḥ pravādyamānaiḥ mahadbhiḥ puṣpameghairabhipravarṣadbhiḥ
T01bsu016_u:7744: tasya tathā vrajato 'ṣṭavartmā mārgaḥ samavasthiṣata nimnonnatavigato
T01bsu016_u:7750: tatra keṣucidratnavyomakeṣu vividharatnaparipūrṇāni ratnabhājanāni sthāpitānyabhūvan yācanakasaṃghapratipādanakārtham
T01bsu016_u:7753: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvākāravividhānnapānarasaparipūrṇāni bhojanāni sthāpitāni, yasya yenārthaḥ tasya taṃ pratipādanārtham /
T01bsu016_u:7756: keṣucidvyomakeṣu vividhojjvalavicitraraṅgaraktāni nānācitrabhaktivinyāsavirājitāni paramamahārhāṇi sūkṣmāṇi sukumārakāntavarṇāni divyavastrakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi sthāpitāni vastrārthināṃ yathābhiprāyaparibhogārtham keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvākāravividhadivyamanojñavarṇagandhāḥ sarvagandhavidhayaḥ sthāpitā abhuvan vilepanārthināṃ yathābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
T01bsu016_u:7757: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvopakaraṇarāśayaḥ sthāpitā abhūvan sattvānāṃ yathāśayābhiprāyaparibhogārtham
T01bsu016_u:7759: prāsādikā darśanīyā vividhacārurūpaveśā vicitramanojñavastrasaṃdhitāḥ sarvābharaṇasvalaṃkṛtā vividhavilepanabhaktivinyāsapratimaṇḍitopaśobhitaśarīrāḥ sarvastrīśilpamāyākalāvidhijñāḥ sthāpitā abhūvan //
T01bsu016_u:7760: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāmeva drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūdrājaparibhogyā
T01bsu016_u:7761: tasyāḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma dārikābhūdabhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā nātidīrghā nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurā nātiśyāmā abhinīlanetrā abhinīlakeśī abhirāmavaktrā brahmasvarā madhurapriyavādinī prājñā sarvakalāvidhijñā sarvaśāstrakovidā dakṣā analasā sagauravā saprasādā maitracittā apratighātabahulā
T01bsu016_u:7762: atṛptikaramanāpadarśanā mandarāgadoṣamohā hryapatrāpyasaṃpannā mārdavā ṛjvī aśāṭyā amāyā (Gv 313) vinītā /
T01bsu016_u:7763: sā mātrā sārdhamanekakanyāparivṛtā ratnarathābhirūḍhā drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā niṣkramya tejodhipate rājakumārasya purataḥ tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ parimārgayamāṇā rājājñāniyogādgacchantī tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tīvraṃ rāgacittamutpādayāmāsa /
T01bsu016_u:7766: yatkhalu amba jānīyāḥ - sacenmāṃ tejodhipate rājakumārasya na dāsyasi,
T01bsu016_u:7773: api tu khalu punardārike gaṇikā vayaṃ sarvalokaratikarāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7775: vayaṃ hi rājño dhanapaterājñayā tejodhipateḥ kumārasyopasthānāya niryātāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7778: tena ceha samayena sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
T01bsu016_u:7781: tatra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgataḥ prathamasaptāhābhisaṃbuddho vyāhārṣīt /
T01bsu016_u:7782: sa tayā dārikayā rathābhirūḍhayaiva pracalāyamānayā svapnāntare dṛṣṭaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7783: prativibuddhāyāśca purāṇajñātisālohitayā devatayā ārocitam - eṣa dārike sūryagātrapravarastathāgato dharmameghodgataprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe viharati prathamasaptāhābhisaṃbuddho bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛto
T01bsu016_u:7786: ākāśadevatā abdevatā jvalanadevatā vāyudevatāḥ sāgaradevatāḥ nadīdevatā parvatadevatā rātridevatā aruṇodgatadevatā vanadevatā vṛkṣadevatā auṣadhidevatāḥ sasyadevatā nagaradevatāḥ padagāminīdevatā bodhimaṇḍadevatāḥ śarīraraśmidevatāḥ sattvanikāyadevatā gaganadevatā sarvadigdevatāśca saṃnipatitāḥ tasya bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya darśanāyeti //
T01bsu016_u:7787: sā tena tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataguṇaśravaṇena ca viśāradā bhūtvā avakāśapratilabdhā tejodhipate rājakumārasya puratastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
T01bsu016_u:7788: rūpavareṇahu loki viśiṣṭā viśruta sarvadiśāsu guṇebhiḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7791: prāṇaśatā bahu naikasahasrā ye mama prekṣiṣu rāgavaśena /
T01bsu016_u:7792: nāpi ca rajyati mahya kumārā kasyacidantiki mānasu loke // 2 //
T01bsu016_u:7793: no ca mama pratihanyati cittaṃ nāpyanunīyati kutraci sattve /
T01bsu016_u:7794: nāpi ca me kvaci vairu na doṣaḥ sarvahite 'bhirataṃ mama cittam // 3 //
T01bsu016_u:7795: yada mi tvamapi dṛṣṭa kumāro rūpabalapravaro guṇadhārī /
T01bsu016_u:7796: tada indriya prīṇita sarve prīta mamo vipulā upajātā // 4 //
T01bsu016_u:7798: subhrulalāṭa sunāsā eṣa nivedayamī tava ātmā // 5 //
T01bsu016_u:7800: purato na virājami tubhyaṃ śyāmakṛtā maṣivigrahatulyā // 6 //
T01bsu016_u:7802: na ca te pratihanyati vācyaṃ agraruta pratigṛhṇami mahyam // 7 //
T01bsu016_u:7803: vadane tava jihva prabhūtā tāmratanū vipulā ratanābhā /
T01bsu016_u:7805: vadane sahitāstava dantā śaṅkhanibhā vimalā suvibhaktā /
T01bsu016_u:7807: smitu yehi vidarśayamānaḥ toṣayase janatāṃ naravīra // 9 //
T01bsu016_u:7808: tava lakṣaṇaśobhana kāyastriṃśa duveva prabhāsura śuddhaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7809: samalaṃkṛtu yehi surūpaḥ cakradharo bhavitāsi narendrā // 10 //
T01bsu016_u:7810: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāmetadavocat - kasya tvaṃ dārike, ko vā tavārakṣakaḥ? na mama dārike
T01bsu016_u:7814: pṛcchāmi te brūhi mamaitamarthaṃ parigrahastvaṃ varagātri kasya // 11 //
T01bsu016_u:7815: mātā pitā vā tava kaccidasti bhartāpi vā svāmi parigraho vā /
T01bsu016_u:7816: sattvo 'pi cānyaḥ khalu yena saṃjñā kṛtā mameti tvayi saumyarūpe // 12 //
T01bsu016_u:7817: kaccinna hiṃsābhirataṃ manaste harasyadattaṃ khalu mā pareṣām /
T01bsu016_u:7818: mā kāmamithyācaraṇe ratiste mā vā mṛṣādya prasṛtaṃ manaste // 13 //
T01bsu016_u:7819: mā mitrabhedaprasṛtā matiste mā marmabhedīni vacāṃsi vakṣi /
T01bsu016_u:7820: mā te 'parakṣeṣu dhaneṣvabhidhyā vyāpādacittaṃ janatāsu cāpi // 14 //
T01bsu016_u:7821: mā dṛṣṭikāntārapathi sthitāsi mā karmavaṃśoddhuracetanā vā /
T01bsu016_u:7822: māyāvinī śāṭhyavaśānugā vā mā bādhase tvaṃ viṣameṇa lokam // 15 //
T01bsu016_u:7825: daridrabhūteṣu ca saṃgrahāya kaccitpradātuṃ prasṛtaṃ manaste // 16 //
T01bsu016_u:7826: premāsti kalyāṇasuhṛtsvatho vā dharmeṇa kāle ca vadanti ye tvām /
T01bsu016_u:7827: kāyasya cittasya ca kalyatāṃ te karmaṇyatāṃ vā janayanti samyak // 17 //
T01bsu016_u:7828: buddheṣu te gauravamasti kaccit premāpi vā buddhasuteṣu tīvram /
T01bsu016_u:7830: kaccitpare tiṣṭhasi dharmavaṃśe na cāpyadharmaṃ carituṃ matiste /
T01bsu016_u:7831: anantavarṇe ca guṇārṇave te kaccitparaṃ prema ca gauravaṃ ca // 19 //
T01bsu016_u:7833: āpāyike karmaṇi ca pravṛttā kaccidbhṛśārtā karuṇāyase tvam // 20 //
T01bsu016_u:7834: pareṣu saṃpattimudīkṣya cāgrāṃ kaccitparāṃ tuṣṭimupaiṣi ca tvam /
T01bsu016_u:7837: kalpānanantān caramāṇa caryāṃ kaccinna te prārthanayāsti khedaḥ // 22 //
T01bsu016_u:7838: atha khalu sudarśanā agragaṇikā sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyo dārikāyā mātā tejodhipatiṃ rājakumārametadavocat - mamaiṣā kumāra dārikā upapādukā padmagarbhasaṃbhūtā nābhiniṣkrāntapūrvā gṛhāt /
T01bsu016_u:7840: māṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ śṛṇu rājaputra yaddārikā te paripṛcchateyam /
T01bsu016_u:7841: vakṣye 'nupūrvyā tava dārikeyaṃ jātā yathā saumya vivardhitā ca // 23 //
T01bsu016_u:7843: niśākṣaye yatra bhavān prasūtaḥ tatraiva jātā mama dārikeyam /
T01bsu016_u:7846: sālaprabhodyānavare madīye ciraṃ mayā tatra vinirgatāham // 25 //
T01bsu016_u:7850: vicitraratnāmbaradhāriṇībhiḥ gīte ca vādye ca suśikṣitābhiḥ // 27 //
T01bsu016_u:7856: āsaṃstadā saṃśayitā janaughā rātryāṃ kimabhyudgata eṣa sūryaḥ // 30 //
T01bsu016_u:7861: na karmaṇo hyasti kṛtasya nāśaḥ pūrve sucīrṇasya vipāka eṣaḥ // 32 //
T01bsu016_u:7867: rutaṃ ca divyaṃ madhuraṃ ruvatyā gandho mukhādvāti yathotpalasya // 35 //
T01bsu016_u:7868: smitaṃ yadaiṣā prakaroti caiva divyaṃ tadā tūryaravaṃ virauti /
T01bsu016_u:7869: strīratnametatkhalu jātu loke na prākṛtānāṃ vaśamabhyupaiti // 36 //
T01bsu016_u:7870: manuṣyaloke na hi vidyate 'sau bhartā hi yo 'syāstvadṛte paraḥ syāt /
T01bsu016_u:7872: hrasvā na ceyaṃ hi na cātidīrghā sthūlā na caiṣā na kṛśātimātram /
T01bsu016_u:7876: śilpāni yāvanti ca sarvaloke pāraṃgateyaṃ nikhileṣu teṣu // 39 //
T01bsu016_u:7877: iṣvastravijñāna paraṃ vidhijñā sattvāna yuktau suviniścitā ca /
T01bsu016_u:7878: ākarṣaṇe śatrumanaḥprasāde sarvatra pāraṃ paramaṃ gateyam // 40 //
T01bsu016_u:7881: ye vyādhayaḥ kecana jīvaloke teṣāṃ samutthānanaye vidhijñā /
T01bsu016_u:7883: jambudhvaje ye 'pi ca sarvamantraniruktibhedā nikhilā janānām /
T01bsu016_u:7884: sarvatra lokavyavahārasaṃghau citre gateyaṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca // 43 //
T01bsu016_u:7885: svarāṅganirhāranayāśca ye 'pi teṣāṃ prabhedeṣu naye praviṣṭā /
T01bsu016_u:7886: gītāni nṛtyāni ca yāni loke teṣvapyaśeṣeṣu paraṃ vidhijñā // 44 //
T01bsu016_u:7887: tūryeṣu vādyeṣu ratiprayoge hāsye ca lāsye ca gatiṃ gateyam /
T01bsu016_u:7889: strīṇāṃ rutānīha ca yāni loke viśeṣatastānyakhilānyavaiti /
T01bsu016_u:7890: ye cāprameyā vanitājanasya doṣā na teṣāṃ nikhilena santi // 46 //
T01bsu016_u:7893: niṣṭhāṃ gatā sarvakalāsu caiva manorathānāṃ paripūraṇī te // 47 //
T01bsu016_u:7894: amatsarā ceyamanīrṣukā ca na kāmalolā na pānagṛddhā /
T01bsu016_u:7898: jīrṇeṣu vṛddheṣu ca rogavatsu daridrabhūteṣu suduḥkhiteṣu /
T01bsu016_u:7901: sarvasya lokasya hitaiṣiṇī ca svalaṃkṛtā cittaguṇairudāraiḥ // 51 //
T01bsu016_u:7902: nityāpramattā smṛtisaṃprajanye sthitā niṣaṇṇā śayitā vrajantī /
T01bsu016_u:7903: tūṣṇīṃ prabhāṣatyapi ca smṛtaiva lokasya caivābhimatā sadaiṣā // 52 //
T01bsu016_u:7904: samantataḥ puṇyavatī vibhāti sadaiva ca premakarī janānām /
T01bsu016_u:7905: etāmudīkṣanna hi tṛptimeti loke na cāsyāḥ kvacidasti saktiḥ // 53 //
T01bsu016_u:7908: sadā svapuṇyaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaiṣā na vidyate 'syāḥ kvacidapyamitram /
T01bsu016_u:7910: jñāne na cāsyāḥ sadṛśāsti yoṣideṣānurūpā tava rājaputra // 55 //
T01bsu016_u:7911: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputro gandhāṅkuraśikharaprabhameghamudyānaṃ praviśya sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyo dārikāyā māturagragaṇikāyāḥ sudarśanāyāḥ samakṣaṃ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāmetadavocat - ahaṃ khalu dārike anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7913: anantamadhyān kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvapāramitāḥ pariśodhayitavyāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7926: aparāntakoṭīgatān kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā annapānadānena sattvāḥ saṃtarpayitavyāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7928: tena mayā sarvasvaparityāgitāyāṃ pratipadyamānena nāsti tadādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā vastu yanna parityaktavyam /
T01bsu016_u:7931: sā tvaṃ mama tadā pareṣu pratipadyamānā dānāntarāyaṃ kariṣyasi /
T01bsu016_u:7935: mamāṅgapratyaṅgāni cchittvā yācanakebhyaḥ parityajyamānasya duḥkhitā durmanasvinī bhaviṣyasi
T01bsu016_u:7936: bhaviṣyati ca sa kālo yadahaṃ tvāṃ parityajya tathāgataśāsane pravrajiṣyāmi /
T01bsu016_u:7938: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata
T01bsu016_u:7940: yataḥ kṛpāṃ sarvajagatsu kṛtvā saṃprasthito 'haṃ sucirāya bodhau // 56 //
T01bsu016_u:7944: tryadhvasthitānāṃ ca mayā jinānāṃ saṃśikṣitā pāramitāpatheṣu /
T01bsu016_u:7946: kṣetrāṇi sarvāṇyapi sarvadikṣu kliṣṭāni śodhyāni mayākhilāni /
T01bsu016_u:7947: sarvākṣaṇā durgatayaśca sarvā vyāvartanīyāḥ khalu sarvaloke // 59 //
T01bsu016_u:7948: sarve ca sattvā nikhilā viśodhyāḥ kleśāvṛtā mohatamondhabhūtāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7950: bhūmīrasaṅgāśca mayā viśodhyā kalpārṇavāścaiva jināḥ prapūjyāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7951: maitrīṃ ca saṃjanya jagatyaśeṣe deyāni dānānyakhilāni loke // 61 //
T01bsu016_u:7953: mā līnadīnā kṛpaṇā tadānīṃ bhūyā mama tvaṃ visabhāgacittā // 62 //
T01bsu016_u:7954: śirorthino me 'rthamudīkṣya dhīmān caryāmudārā ca ratastadānīm /
T01bsu016_u:7956: tvaṃ daurmanasyaṃ mama hastapādacchedān pradāsyāmyāpi yācakānām /
T01bsu016_u:7958: priyāṇi vastūni tathaiva putrān dāsyāmi ca tvāmahamarthinaḥ san /
T01bsu016_u:7959: śrutvaitamarthaṃ yadi te na sādaḥ sarvaṃ tathaivāstu yathā taveṣṭam // 65
T01bsu016_u:7963: ahaṃ te yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā yathecchāparibhogyā yenakāmaṃgamā sarvatrātyantānugāminī nityānubaddhā sarvakāryotsukā āśayānukūlopacārā samyakparākramā aviṣamapratipattiprayogopacārā bhaviṣyāmi atha khalu sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrdārikā tejodhipatiṃ rājaputraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
T01bsu016_u:7964: kāyo hi yanme narakāgnināyaṃ saṃtāpyamāno vilayaṃ prayāyāt /
T01bsu016_u:7967: tadutsahe 'haṃ sthiradhīracittā bhartā bhava tvaṃ mama sādhurūpa // 67 //
T01bsu016_u:7969: āklāntacittāpi tadutsahe 'haṃ svāmī bhava tvaṃ mama sādhvacintya // 68 //
T01bsu016_u:7970: jātyantarāṇyapyamitāni ca tvaṃ chittvāṅgamātmāni parasya dehi /
T01bsu016_u:7971: cetovaśitvaṃ mayi saṃniveśya dṛḍhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaya māṃ svadharme // 69 //
T01bsu016_u:7973: caryāṃ caran kalpamahāsamudrān prayaccha māmarthijanāya hṛṣṭām // 70 //
T01bsu016_u:7979: śuddhābhinīlekṣaṇa maitracittā yathekṣase tvaṃ khalu sarvaloke /
T01bsu016_u:7980: āraktacittaḥ karuṇāyamāno niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvaṃ bhavitā munīndraḥ // 73 //
T01bsu016_u:7981: yathā kramātprakramato mahī te ratnojjvalā tiṣṭhati nirmaleyam /
T01bsu016_u:7982: sallakṣaṇālaṃkṛta cakravartī niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvaṃ bhavitā nṛloke // 74 //
T01bsu016_u:7986: svapnāntare murdhnyakarotsa me 'dya pāṇiṃ prabuddhā muditā tato 'ham // 76
T01bsu016_u:7989: abhūtpurā me khalu cetanaivamīkṣeya tejodhipatiṃ kumāram /
T01bsu016_u:7990: ārocitaṃ devatayā kumāraṃ tvaṃ drakṣyasītyadya niśāntare me // 78 //
T01bsu016_u:7991: svapnāntare me sugato 'dya dṛṣṭaḥ tvaṃ caiva dṛṣṭaḥ pariśuddhasattvaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:7993: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā buddhadarśanāvakāśapratilabdho mahāprītiprasādavegasaṃjātaḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāṃ (Gv 325)
T01bsu016_u:7996: saivaṃ satkṛtā na hṛpyati notpluvati na carati vā pramādaṃ vāgamat anyatra kṛtāñjalipuṭā animiṣanayanā tejodhipateḥ kumārasya vadanaṃ prekṣamāṇā sthitābhūt //
T01bsu016_u:7997: atha khalu sudarśanā agragaṇikā tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
T01bsu016_u:7998: dadyāmimāṃ te khalu dārikāṃ hamityevamāsīnmama dirgharātram /
T01bsu016_u:7999: seyaṃ pradattā tava cārurūpā svalaṃkṛtā puṇyaguṇairupetā // 80 //
T01bsu016_u:8000: manuṣyaloke sadṛśī na kanyā saṃvidyate 'syāḥ kvaciduttamā yā /
T01bsu016_u:8001: śīlena buddhyātha guṇaistathānyaiḥ strīṇāṃ vareyaṃ svalu sarvaloke // 81
T01bsu016_u:8002: padmodbhaveyaṃ na hi jātivādaḥ saṃdūṣaṇāmarhati nirmalatvāt /
T01bsu016_u:8006: yo 'syāḥ śubho vāti hi gātragandho varāṃstadanyānabhibhūya gandhān /
T01bsu016_u:8008: asyā hi kāyaḥ kanakaprakāśo virocate nirmalapadmagarbhaḥ /
