T01bsu016_u:10564: buddhotpādasāgarasamavasaraṇānāṃ buddhotpādasāgarasaṃbhavānāṃ buddhotpādasāgaravibhavānāṃ bodhisattvasāgaraparṣanmaṇḍalasāgarāṇāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasāgaraparaṃparāṇāṃ bodhisattvaparṣamaṇḍalasāgaragarbhāṇāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasāgarasaṃbhedānāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasāgarasamavasaraṇānāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasāgarasaṃbhavānāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasāgaravibhavānāṃ sattvadhātupraveśānāṃ
T01bsu016_u:10565: sattvendriyapratikṣaṇajñānapraveśānāṃ sattveindriyajñānaprativedhānāṃ sattvaparipākavinayānāṃ gambhīrabodhisattvavikurvitavihārāṇāṃ bodhisattvabhūmyavakramaṇavikramasāgarāṇāṃ paryantaṃ nopajagāma /
T01bsu016_u:10569: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe ca anantamadhyān kṣetrasāgarānavatarati sma, sattvāṃśca paripācayati
T01bsu016_u:10572: yāvatsamantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānasāgarasamatāmanuprāptaḥ sarvatathāgatasamatāṃ sarvakṣetrakāyapāraṇasamatāṃ caryāparipūraṇasamatāmabhisaṃbodhivikurvitasaṃdarśanapāraṇasamatāṃ dharmacakrapravartanasamatāṃ pratisaṃvidviśuddhisamatāṃ ghoṣodāhārasamatāṃ sarvasvarāṅgasāgarasaṃprayogasamatāṃ balavaiśāradyasamatāṃ buddhavihārasamatāṃ mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāsamatāmacintyabodhisattvavimokṣavikurvitasamatāmanuprāptaḥ iti //
T01bsu016_u:10573: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparaṃparānabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotayamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
T01bsu016_u:10574: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10575: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ // 1 //
T01bsu016_u:10582: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān // 4 //
T01bsu016_u:10584: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi // 5 //
T01bsu016_u:10587: yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /
T01bsu016_u:10589: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
T01bsu016_u:10590: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam // 8 //
T01bsu016_u:10591: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /
T01bsu016_u:10592: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam // 9 //
T01bsu016_u:10593: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṅgataprāptāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10594: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṃ cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai // 10 //
T01bsu016_u:10599: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam // 12 //
T01bsu016_u:10600: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca ghriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
T01bsu016_u:10601: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ // 13 //
T01bsu016_u:10602: yāvat keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10604: yāvat keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10605: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā // 15 //
T01bsu016_u:10606: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /
T01bsu016_u:10607: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā // 16 //
T01bsu016_u:10611: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam // 18 //
T01bsu016_u:10612: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet /
T01bsu016_u:10614: ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam // 19 //
T01bsu016_u:10615: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
T01bsu016_u:10616: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ // 20 //
T01bsu016_u:10617: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10618: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu // 21 //
T01bsu016_u:10620: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 22 //
T01bsu016_u:10621: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
T01bsu016_u:10622: kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam // 23 //
T01bsu016_u:10623: ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10624: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu // 24 //
T01bsu016_u:10625: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
T01bsu016_u:10626: teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ // 25 //
T01bsu016_u:10628: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 26 //
T01bsu016_u:10630: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10632: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān /
T01bsu016_u:10633: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ // 28 //
T01bsu016_u:10640: ekakṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpapraveśa ahaṃ praviśeyam /
T01bsu016_u:10641: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam // 32 //
T01bsu016_u:10642: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
T01bsu016_u:10643: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena // 33 //
T01bsu016_u:10647: ye ca ānāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
T01bsu016_u:10648: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān // 35 //
T01bsu016_u:10660: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣān bhadracarīya vibudhyiya bodhim // 41 //
T01bsu016_u:10662: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10663: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 42 //
T01bsu016_u:10665: yādṛśa nāmana bhadra vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena // 43 //
T01bsu016_u:10667: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām // 44 //
T01bsu016_u:10668: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
T01bsu016_u:10669: apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām // 45 //
T01bsu016_u:10670: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
T01bsu016_u:10671: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvataniṣṭha mama praṇidhānam // 46 //
T01bsu016_u:10672: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā rathaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
T01bsu016_u:10673: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam // 47 //
T01bsu016_u:10676: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10677: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracaripraṇidhānam // 49 //
T01bsu016_u:10679: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣa janma /
T01bsu016_u:10680: yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti // 50 //
T01bsu016_u:10681: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
T01bsu016_u:10682: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam // 51 //
T01bsu016_u:10683: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirupetaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10685: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
T01bsu016_u:10686: budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam // 53 //
T01bsu016_u:10687: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
T01bsu016_u:10688: buddha vijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha // 54 //
T01bsu016_u:10689: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
T01bsu016_u:10690: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //
T01bsu016_u:10692: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //
T01bsu016_u:10693: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
T01bsu016_u:10694: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //
T01bsu016_u:10696: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
T01bsu016_u:10697: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kari yāvata loke // 58 //
T01bsu016_u:10698: tahi jinamaṇḍali śobhani ramye padmavare rucire upapannaḥ /
T01bsu016_u:10699: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato abhitābhajinasya // 59 //
T01bsu016_u:10701: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // 60 //
T01bsu016_u:10702: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
T01bsu016_u:10703: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam // 61 //
T01bsu016_u:10707: sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaste ca bodhisattvā āryamañjuśrīpūrvaṃgamāḥ, te ca bhikṣavaḥ āryamañjuśrīparipācitāḥ, te ca āryamaitreyapūrvaṃgamāḥ
T01bsu016_u:10708: sarvabhadrakalpikā bodhisattvāḥ, te cāryasamantabhadrabodhisattvapramukhā yauvarājyābhiṣiktāḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamā mahābodhisattvā
T01bsu016_u:10709: nānālokadhātusaṃnipatitāḥ, te cāryaśāriputramaudgalyāyanapramukhā mahāśrāvakāḥ, sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat, sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti āryagaṇḍavyūhānmahādharmaparyāyādyathālabdhaḥ sudhanakalyāṇamitraparyupāsanacaryaikadeśaḥ āryagaṇḍavyūho mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ samāptaḥ //
T01bsu016_u:10710: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tethāgato hyavadat /
T01bsu016_u:10711: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
